avi_analyticsprofile.description: Module for setup of AnalyticsProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_analyticsprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. The name of the analytics profile.

conn_lossy_zero_win_size_event_threshold: ${2:undefined} # not required. A client connection is considered lossy when percentage of times a packet could not be trasmitted due to tcp zero window is above this threshold.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.,Units(PERCENT).

exclude_no_valid_gs_member_as_error: ${3:undefined} # not required. Exclude queries to gslb services that have no available members from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

exclude_client_close_before_request_as_error: ${4:undefined} # not required. Exclude client closed connection before an http request could be completed from being classified as an error.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

apdex_rtt_tolerated_factor: ${5:undefined} # not required. Tolerated client to avi round trip time(rtt) factor.,It is a multiple of apdex_rtt_tolerated_factor.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

apdex_response_tolerated_factor: ${6:undefined} # not required. Client tolerated response latency factor.,Client must receive a response within this factor times the satisfactory threshold (apdex_response_threshold) to be considered tolerated.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

disable_se_analytics: ${7:undefined} # not required. Disable node (service engine) level analytics forvs metrics.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_min_dos_rate: ${8:undefined} # not required. Dos connection rate below which the dos security assessment will not kick in.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1000.
hs_security_selfsignedcert_penalty: ${9:undefined} # not required. Deprecated.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

apdex_response_threshold: ${10:undefined} # not required. If a client receives an http response in less than the satisfactory latency threshold, the request is considered satisfied.,It is considered tolerated if it is not satisfied and less than tolerated latency factor multiplied by the satisfactory latency threshold.,Greater than this number and the client's request is considered frustrated.,Allowed values are 1-30000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 500.,Units(MILLISECONDS).

apdex_server_response_tolerated_factor: ${11:undefined} # not required. Server tolerated response latency factor.,Servermust response within this factor times the satisfactory threshold (apdex_server_response_threshold) to be considered tolerated.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

hs_max_anomaly_penalty: ${12:undefined} # not required. Maximum penalty that may be deducted from health score for anomalies.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.

apdex_rtt_threshold: ${13:undefined} # not required. Satisfactory client to avi round trip time(rtt).,Allowed values are 1-2000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 250.,Units(MILLISECONDS).
password: ${14:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

exclude_http_error_codes: ${15:undefined} # not required. List of http status codes to be excluded from being classified as an error.,Error connections or responses impacts health score, are included as significant logs, and may be classified as part of a dos attack.
tenant: ${16:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

conn_server_lossy_total_rexmt_threshold: ${17:undefined} # not required. A connection between avi and server is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.,Units(PERCENT).

exclude_server_tcp_reset_as_error: ${18:undefined} # not required. Exclude server tcp reset from errors.,It is common for applications like ms exchange.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_cipherscore_ge128b: ${19:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the minimum cipher strength is greater than equal to 128 bits.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.
url: ${20:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${21|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.

exclude_server_dns_error_as_error: ${22:undefined} # not required. Exclude server dns error response from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

exclude_dns_policy_drop_as_significant: ${23:undefined} # not required. Exclude dns policy drops from the list of errors.,Field introduced in 17.2.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
api_context: ${24:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

hs_max_resources_penalty: ${25:undefined} # not required. Maximum penalty that may be deducted from health score for high resource utilization.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 25.

exclude_invalid_dns_query_as_error: ${26:undefined} # not required. Exclude invalid dns queries from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

exclude_gs_down_as_error: ${27:undefined} # not required. Exclude queries to gslb services that are operationally down from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_performance_boost: ${28:undefined} # not required. Adds free performance score credits to health score.,It can be used for compensating health score for known slow applications.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

hs_security_tls11_score: ${29:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when supporting tls1.1 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.
tenant_ref: ${30:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

hs_security_certscore_expired: ${31:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the certificate has expired.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.
api_version: ${32:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

exclude_unsupported_dns_query_as_error: ${33:undefined} # not required. Exclude unsupported dns queries from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_tls10_score: ${34:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when supporting tls1.0 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.
resp_code_block: ${35:undefined} # not required. Block of http response codes to be excluded from being classified as an error.,Enum options - AP_HTTP_RSP_4XX, AP_HTTP_RSP_5XX.

hs_max_security_penalty: ${36:undefined} # not required. Maximum penalty that may be deducted from health score based on security assessment.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.

exclude_invalid_dns_domain_as_error: ${37:undefined} # not required. Exclude dns queries to domains outside the domains configured in the dns application profile from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

apdex_rum_threshold: ${38:undefined} # not required. If a client is able to load a page in less than the satisfactory latency threshold, the pageload is considered satisfied.,It is considered tolerated if it is greater than satisfied but less than the tolerated latency multiplied by satisifed latency.,Greater than this number and the client's request is considered frustrated.,A pageload includes the time for dns lookup, download of all http objects, and page render time.,Allowed values are 1-30000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5000.,Units(MILLISECONDS).

hs_pscore_traffic_threshold_l4_server: ${39:undefined} # not required. Threshold number of connections in 5min, below which apdexr, apdexc, rum_apdex, and other network quality metrics are not computed.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.0.

exclude_no_dns_record_as_error: ${40:undefined} # not required. Exclude queries to domains that did not have configured services/records from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_encalgo_score_rc4: ${41:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when rc4 algorithm is used for encryption.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.5.

hs_security_nonpfs_penalty: ${42:undefined} # not required. Penalty for allowing non-pfs handshakes.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

hs_security_certscore_le30d: ${43:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the certificate expires in less than or equal to 30 days.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

hs_security_chain_invalidity_penalty: ${44:undefined} # not required. Penalty for allowing certificates with invalid chain.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

hs_security_tls12_score: ${45:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when supporting tls1.2 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.

conn_lossy_ooo_threshold: ${46:undefined} # not required. A connection between client and avi is considered lossy when more than this percentage of out of order packets are received.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.,Units(PERCENT).

disable_server_analytics: ${47:undefined} # not required. Disable analytics on backend servers.,This may be desired in container environment when there are large number of  ephemeral servers.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
ranges: ${48:undefined} # not required. List of http status code ranges to be excluded from being classified as an error.

hs_security_ssl30_score: ${49:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when supporting ssl3.0 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.5.

conn_server_lossy_timeo_rexmt_threshold: ${50:undefined} # not required. A connection between avi and server is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted due to timeout.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.,Units(PERCENT).

exclude_tcp_reset_as_error: ${51:undefined} # not required. Exclude tcp resets by client from the list of potential errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

conn_server_lossy_zero_win_size_event_threshold: ${52:undefined} # not required. A server connection is considered lossy when percentage of times a packet could not be trasmitted due to tcp zero window is above this threshold.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.,Units(PERCENT).

hs_event_throttle_window: ${53:undefined} # not required. Time window (in secs) within which only unique health change events should occur.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1209600.

hs_security_cipherscore_eq000b: ${54:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the minimum cipher strength is 0 bits.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.
client_log_streaming_config: ${55:undefined} # not required. Configure to stream logs to an external server.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

exclude_syn_retransmit_as_error: ${56:undefined} # not required. Exclude 'server unanswered syns' from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_hsts_penalty: ${57:undefined} # not required. Penalty for not enabling hsts.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

hs_pscore_traffic_threshold_l4_client: ${58:undefined} # not required. Threshold number of connections in 5min, below which apdexr, apdexc, rum_apdex, and other network quality metrics are not computed.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.0.

hs_security_cipherscore_lt128b: ${59:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the minimum cipher strength is less than 128 bits.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.5.

hs_security_certscore_le07d: ${60:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the certificate expires in less than or equal to 7 days.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.0.

hs_security_weak_signature_algo_penalty: ${61:undefined} # not required. Penalty for allowing weak signature algorithm(s).,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

hs_security_encalgo_score_none: ${62:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when no algorithm is used for encryption.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.
controller: ${63:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
avi_credentials: ${64:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.

hs_security_certscore_gt30d: ${65:undefined} # not required. Score assigned when the certificate expires in more than 30 days.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.
description: ${66:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.

apdex_server_rtt_tolerated_factor: ${67:undefined} # not required. Tolerated client to avi round trip time(rtt) factor.,It is a multiple of apdex_rtt_tolerated_factor.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.
avi_api_update_method: ${68|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.

apdex_rum_tolerated_factor: ${69:undefined} # not required. Virtual service threshold factor for tolerated page load time (plt) as multiple of apdex_rum_threshold.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

apdex_server_rtt_threshold: ${70:undefined} # not required. Satisfactory client to avi round trip time(rtt).,Allowed values are 1-2000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 125.,Units(MILLISECONDS).
tenant_uuid: ${71:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

apdex_server_response_threshold: ${72:undefined} # not required. A server http response is considered satisfied if latency is less than the satisfactory latency threshold.,The response is considered tolerated when it is greater than satisfied but less than the tolerated latency factor * s_latency.,Greater than this number and the server response is considered frustrated.,Allowed values are 1-30000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 400.,Units(MILLISECONDS).

exclude_persistence_change_as_error: ${73:undefined} # not required. Exclude persistence server changed while load balancing' from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

conn_lossy_timeo_rexmt_threshold: ${74:undefined} # not required. A connection between client and avi is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted due to timeout.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.,Units(PERCENT).
avi_api_patch_op: ${75|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${76:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the analytics profile.

conn_lossy_total_rexmt_threshold: ${77:undefined} # not required. A connection between client and avi is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.,Units(PERCENT).

conn_server_lossy_ooo_threshold: ${78:undefined} # not required. A connection between avi and server is considered lossy when more than this percentage of out of order packets are received.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.,Units(PERCENT).
username: ${79:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
client_log_config: ${80:undefined} # not required. Configure which logs are sent to the avi controller from ses and how they are processed.
avi_api_session:
http_method: ${1|get,put,post,patch,delete|} # required. choices: get;put;post;patch;delete. Allowed HTTP methods for RESTful services and are supported by Avi Controller.
params: ${2:undefined} # not required. Query parameters passed to the HTTP API.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
password: ${4:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
data: ${5:undefined} # not required. HTTP body in YAML or JSON format.
api_version: ${6:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${7:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${8:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
path: ${9:undefined} # not required. Path for Avi API resource. For example, C(path: virtualservice) will translate to C(api/virtualserivce).
controller: ${10:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
timeout: ${11:60} # not required. Timeout (in seconds) for Avi API calls.
username: ${12:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
avi_credentials: ${13:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_version:
tenant: ${1:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
username: ${3:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
password: ${4:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
controller: ${5:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
api_version: ${6:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${7:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_credentials: ${8:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.

avi_applicationpersistenceprofile.description: Module for setup of ApplicationPersistenceProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_applicationpersistenceprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. A user-friendly name for the persistence profile.

persistence_type: ${2:undefined} # required. Method used to persist clients to the same server for a duration of time or a session.,Enum options - PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_HTTP_COOKIE, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_TLS, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CLIENT_IPV6_ADDRESS,,PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CUSTOM_HTTP_HEADER, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_APP_COOKIE, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_GSLB_SITE.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

is_federated: ${4:undefined} # not required. This field describes the object's replication scope.,If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines.,If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

avi_cloud.description: Module for setup of Cloud Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_cloud:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.

vtype: ${2:undefined} # required. Cloud type.,Enum options - CLOUD_NONE, CLOUD_VCENTER, CLOUD_OPENSTACK, CLOUD_AWS, CLOUD_VCA, CLOUD_APIC, CLOUD_MESOS, CLOUD_LINUXSERVER, CLOUD_DOCKER_UCP,,CLOUD_RANCHER, CLOUD_OSHIFT_K8S, CLOUD_AZURE.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as CLOUD_NONE.
vcenter_configuration: ${3:undefined} # not required. Vcenterconfiguration settings for cloud.
proxy_configuration: ${4:undefined} # not required. Proxyconfiguration settings for cloud.
obj_name_prefix: ${5:undefined} # not required. Default prefix for all automatically created objects in this cloud.,This prefix can be overridden by the se-group template.
api_version: ${6:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
cloudstack_configuration: ${7:undefined} # not required. Cloudstackconfiguration settings for cloud.
aws_configuration: ${8:undefined} # not required. Awsconfiguration settings for cloud.
tenant: ${9:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

license_tier: ${10:undefined} # not required. Specifies the default license tier which would be used by new se groups.,This field by default inherits the value from system configuration.,Enum options - ENTERPRISE_16, ENTERPRISE_18.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.
password: ${11:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
nsx_configuration: ${12:undefined} # not required. Configuration parameters for nsx manager.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

license_type: ${13:undefined} # not required. If no license type is specified then default license enforcement for the cloud type is chosen.,The default mappings are container cloud is max ses, openstack and vmware is cores and linux it is sockets.,Enum options - LIC_BACKEND_SERVERS, LIC_SOCKETS, LIC_CORES, LIC_HOSTS, LIC_SE_BANDWIDTH.
apic_configuration: ${14:undefined} # not required. Apicconfiguration settings for cloud.
east_west_dns_provider_ref: ${15:undefined} # not required. Dns profile for east-west services.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.

east_west_ipam_provider_ref: ${16:undefined} # not required. Ipam profile for east-west services.,Warning - please use virtual subnets in this ipam profile that do not conflict with the underlay networks or any overlay networks in the cluster.,For example in aws and gcp, 169.254.0.0/16 is used for storing instance metadata.,Hence, it should not be used in this profile.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.
docker_configuration: ${17:undefined} # not required. Dockerconfiguration settings for cloud.
url: ${18:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${19|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.

enable_vip_static_routes: ${20:undefined} # not required. Use static routes for vip side network resolution during virtualservice placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
ipam_provider_ref: ${21:undefined} # not required. Ipam profile for the cloud.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.
api_context: ${22:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
vca_configuration: ${23:undefined} # not required. Vcloudairconfiguration settings for cloud.
azure_configuration: ${24:undefined} # not required. Field introduced in 17.2.1.
mesos_configuration: ${25:undefined} # not required. Mesosconfiguration settings for cloud.
custom_tags: ${26:undefined} # not required. Custom tags for all avi created resources in the cloud infrastructure.,Field introduced in 17.1.5.

prefer_static_routes: ${27:undefined} # not required. Prefer static routes over interface routes during virtualservice placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

state_based_dns_registration: ${28:undefined} # not required. Dns records for vips are added/deleted based on the operational state of the vips.,Field introduced in 17.1.12.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
dns_provider_ref: ${29:undefined} # not required. Dns profile for the cloud.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.
dhcp_enabled: ${30:undefined} # not required. Select the ip address management scheme.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_credentials: ${31:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
tenant_ref: ${32:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
mtu: ${33:undefined} # not required. Mtu setting for the cloud.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1500.,Units(BYTES).
avi_api_update_method: ${34|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
openstack_configuration: ${35:undefined} # not required. Openstackconfiguration settings for cloud.
linuxserver_configuration: ${36:undefined} # not required. Linuxserverconfiguration settings for cloud.
tenant_uuid: ${37:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
oshiftk8s_configuration: ${38:undefined} # not required. Oshiftk8sconfiguration settings for cloud.
avi_api_patch_op: ${39|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${40:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
rancher_configuration: ${41:undefined} # not required. Rancherconfiguration settings for cloud.
controller: ${42:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
username: ${43:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
apic_mode: ${44:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set apic_mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

avi_controllerproperties.description: Module for setup of ControllerProperties Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_controllerproperties:

secure_channel_controller_token_timeout: ${1:undefined} # not required. Number of secure_channel_controller_token_timeout.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).
attach_ip_retry_limit: ${2:undefined} # not required. Number of attach_ip_retry_limit.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.
vnic_op_fail_time: ${3:undefined} # not required. Number of vnic_op_fail_time.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 180.,Units(SEC).
max_dead_se_in_grp: ${4:undefined} # not required. Number of max_dead_se_in_grp.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
api_version: ${5:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
allow_unauthenticated_apis: ${6:undefined} # not required. Allow unauthenticated access for special apis.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
vs_se_ping_fail: ${7:undefined} # not required. Number of vs_se_ping_fail.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(SEC).
vs_se_create_fail: ${8:undefined} # not required. Number of vs_se_create_fail.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1500.,Units(SEC).
ssl_certificate_expiry_warning_days: ${9:undefined} # not required. Number of days for ssl certificate expiry warning.,Units(DAYS).
fatal_error_lease_time: ${10:undefined} # not required. Number of fatal_error_lease_time.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 120.,Units(SEC).

vs_key_rotate_period: ${11:undefined} # not required. Allowed values are 1-1051200.,Special values are 0 - 'disabled'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).
se_create_timeout: ${12:undefined} # not required. Number of se_create_timeout.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 900.,Units(SEC).
dead_se_detection_timer: ${13:undefined} # not required. Number of dead_se_detection_timer.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 360.,Units(SEC).
dummy: ${14:undefined} # not required. Number of dummy.
password: ${15:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

max_seq_attach_ip_failures: ${16:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of consecutive attach ip failures that halts vs placement.,Field introduced in 17.2.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.

bm_use_ansible: ${17:undefined} # not required. Use ansible for se creation in baremetal.,Field introduced in 17.2.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

secure_channel_cleanup_timeout: ${18:undefined} # not required. Number of secure_channel_cleanup_timeout.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).
se_vnic_cooldown: ${19:undefined} # not required. Number of se_vnic_cooldown.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 120.,Units(SEC).

allow_unauthenticated_nodes: ${20:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set allow_unauthenticated_nodes.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

vs_se_attach_ip_fail: ${21:undefined} # not required. Time to wait before marking attach ip operation on an se as failed.,Field introduced in 17.2.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3600.,Units(SEC).
avi_api_update_method: ${22|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.

vs_apic_scaleout_timeout: ${23:undefined} # not required. Time to wait for the scaled out se to become ready before marking the scaleout done, applies to apic configuration only.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 360.,Units(SEC).
crashed_se_reboot: ${24:undefined} # not required. Number of crashed_se_reboot.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 900.,Units(SEC).
url: ${25:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
vs_awaiting_se_timeout: ${26:undefined} # not required. Number of vs_awaiting_se_timeout.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(SEC).
se_offline_del: ${27:undefined} # not required. Number of se_offline_del.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 172000.,Units(SEC).
safenet_hsm_version: ${28:undefined} # not required. Version of the safenet package installed on the controller.,Field introduced in 16.5.2,17.2.3.
vs_se_vnic_ip_fail: ${29:undefined} # not required. Number of vs_se_vnic_ip_fail.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 120.,Units(SEC).
tenant: ${30:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

secure_channel_se_token_timeout: ${31:undefined} # not required. Number of secure_channel_se_token_timeout.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).
query_host_fail: ${32:undefined} # not required. Number of query_host_fail.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 180.,Units(SEC).

appviewx_compat_mode: ${33:undefined} # not required. Export configuration in appviewx compatibility mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

persistence_key_rotate_period: ${34:undefined} # not required. Allowed values are 1-1051200.,Special values are 0 - 'disabled'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).

seupgrade_fabric_pool_size: ${35:undefined} # not required. Pool size used for all fabric commands during se upgrade.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.
max_pcap_per_tenant: ${36:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of pcap files stored per tenant.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.
unresponsive_se_reboot: ${37:undefined} # not required. Number of unresponsive_se_reboot.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).

warmstart_se_reconnect_wait_time: ${38:undefined} # not required. Number of warmstart_se_reconnect_wait_time.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).

cluster_ip_gratuitous_arp_period: ${39:undefined} # not required. Number of cluster_ip_gratuitous_arp_period.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).
avi_credentials: ${40:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
dns_refresh_period: ${41:undefined} # not required. Number of dns_refresh_period.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 60.,Units(MIN).
state: ${42|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
api_idle_timeout: ${43:undefined} # not required. Allowed values are 0-1440.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 15.,Units(MIN).

upgrade_dns_ttl: ${44:undefined} # not required. Time to account for dns ttl during upgrade.,This is in addition to vs_scalein_timeout_for_upgrade in se_group.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.,Units(SEC).
vs_se_bootup_fail: ${45:undefined} # not required. Number of vs_se_bootup_fail.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 480.,Units(SEC).
max_seq_vnic_failures: ${46:undefined} # not required. Number of max_seq_vnic_failures.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.
api_context: ${47:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
tenant_uuid: ${48:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
attach_ip_retry_interval: ${49:undefined} # not required. Number of attach_ip_retry_interval.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 360.,Units(SEC).

seupgrade_segroup_min_dead_timeout: ${50:undefined} # not required. Time to wait before marking segroup upgrade as stuck.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 360.,Units(SEC).
avi_api_patch_op: ${51|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${52:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
allow_ip_forwarding: ${53:undefined} # not required. Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
portal_token: ${54:undefined} # not required. Token used for uploading tech-support to portal.,Field introduced in 16.4.6,17.1.2.
controller: ${55:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
upgrade_lease_time: ${56:undefined} # not required. Number of upgrade_lease_time.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 360.,Units(SEC).
username: ${57:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
vs_se_vnic_fail: ${58:undefined} # not required. Number of vs_se_vnic_fail.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).

se_failover_attempt_interval: ${59:undefined} # not required. Interval between attempting failovers to an se.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).

avi_gslb.description: Module for setup of Gslb Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_gslb:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name for the gslb object.
leader_cluster_uuid: ${2:undefined} # required. Mark this site as leader of gslb configuration.,This site is the one among the avi sites.

is_federated: ${3:undefined} # not required. This field indicates that this object is replicated across gslb federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
avi_credentials: ${4:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.

view_id: ${5:undefined} # not required. The view-id is used in change-leader mode to differentiate partitioned groups while they have the same gslb namespace.,Each partitioned group will be able to operate independently by using the view-id.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
api_context: ${6:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
controller: ${7:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

maintenance_mode: ${8:undefined} # not required. This field disables the configuration operations on the leader for all federated objects.,Cud operations on gslb, gslbservice, gslbgeodbprofile and other federated objects will be rejected.,The rest-api disabling helps in upgrade scenarios where we don't want configuration sync operations to the gslb member when the member is being,upgraded.,This configuration programmatically blocks the leader from accepting new gslb configuration when member sites are undergoing upgrade.,Field introduced in 17.2.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
third_party_sites: ${9:undefined} # not required. Third party site member belonging to this gslb.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

clear_on_max_retries: ${10:undefined} # not required. Max retries after which the remote site is treated as a fresh start.,In fresh start all the configs are downloaded.,Allowed values are 1-1024.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.
tenant_ref: ${11:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${12:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
password: ${13:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_api_update_method: ${14|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.

send_interval: ${15:undefined} # not required. Frequency with which group members communicate.,Allowed values are 1-3600.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 15.,Units(SEC).
api_version: ${16:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${17:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${18:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${19|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${20:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the gslb object.
client_ip_addr_group: ${21:undefined} # not required. Group to specify if the client ip addresses are public or private.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.
dns_configs: ${22:undefined} # not required. Sub domain configuration for the gslb.,Gslb service's fqdn must be a match one of these subdomains.
url: ${23:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${24|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${25:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
sites: ${26:undefined} # not required. Select avi site member belonging to this gslb.

avi_gslbhealthmonitor.description: Module for setup of GslbHealthMonitor Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_gslbhealthmonitor:

type: ${1:undefined} # required. Type of the health monitor.,Enum options - HEALTH_MONITOR_PING, HEALTH_MONITOR_TCP, HEALTH_MONITOR_HTTP, HEALTH_MONITOR_HTTPS, HEALTH_MONITOR_EXTERNAL, HEALTH_MONITOR_UDP,,HEALTH_MONITOR_DNS, HEALTH_MONITOR_GSLB.
name: ${2:undefined} # required. A user friendly name for this health monitor.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
avi_credentials: ${4:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.

receive_timeout: ${5:undefined} # not required. A valid response from the server is expected within the receive timeout window.,This timeout must be less than the send interval.,If server status is regularly flapping up and down, consider increasing this value.,Allowed values are 1-300.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.
http_monitor: ${6:undefined} # not required. Healthmonitorhttp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
external_monitor: ${7:undefined} # not required. Healthmonitorexternal settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
tcp_monitor: ${8:undefined} # not required. Healthmonitortcp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.

monitor_port: ${9:undefined} # not required. Use this port instead of the port defined for the server in the pool.,If the monitor succeeds to this port, the load balanced traffic will still be sent to the port of the server defined within the pool.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Special values are 0 - 'use server port'.
tenant_ref: ${10:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${11:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.

failed_checks: ${12:undefined} # not required. Number of continuous failed health checks before the server is marked down.,Allowed values are 1-50.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.
udp_monitor: ${13:undefined} # not required. Healthmonitorudp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
dns_monitor: ${14:undefined} # not required. Healthmonitordns settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
password: ${15:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
api_version: ${16:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${17:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

successful_checks: ${18:undefined} # not required. Number of continuous successful health checks before server is marked up.,Allowed values are 1-50.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.
tenant: ${19:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
https_monitor: ${20:undefined} # not required. Healthmonitorhttp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
uuid: ${21:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the health monitor.
controller: ${22:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${23:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${24|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${25:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_gslbservice.description: Module for setup of GslbService Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_gslbservice:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name for the gslb service.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

is_federated: ${3:undefined} # not required. This field indicates that this object is replicated across gslb federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

health_monitor_scope: ${4:undefined} # not required. Health monitor probe can be executed for all the members or it can be executed only for third-party members.,This operational mode is useful to reduce the number of health monitor probes in case of a hybrid scenario.,In such a case, avi members can have controller derived status while non-avi members can be probed by via health monitor probes in dataplane.,Enum options - GSLB_SERVICE_HEALTH_MONITOR_ALL_MEMBERS, GSLB_SERVICE_HEALTH_MONITOR_ONLY_NON_AVI_MEMBERS.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as GSLB_SERVICE_HEALTH_MONITOR_ALL_MEMBERS.
avi_credentials: ${5:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
tenant_ref: ${6:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

num_dns_ip: ${7:undefined} # not required. Number of ip addresses of this gslb service to be returned by the dns service.,Enter 0 to return all ip addresses.,Allowed values are 1-20.,Special values are 0- 'return all ip addresses'.
tenant_uuid: ${8:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

health_monitor_refs: ${9:undefined} # not required. Verify vs health by applying one or more health monitors.,Active monitors generate synthetic traffic from dns service engine and to mark a vs up or down based on the response.,It is a reference to an object of type healthmonitor.

enabled: ${10:undefined} # not required. Enable or disable the gslb service.,If the gslb service is enabled, then the vips are sent in the dns responses based on reachability and configured algorithm.,If the gslb service is disabled, then the vips are no longer available in the dns response.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

pool_algorithm: ${11:undefined} # not required. The load balancing algorithm will pick a gslb pool within the gslb service list of available pools.,Enum options - GSLB_SERVICE_ALGORITHM_PRIORITY, GSLB_SERVICE_ALGORITHM_GEO.,Field introduced in 17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as GSLB_SERVICE_ALGORITHM_PRIORITY.
created_by: ${12:undefined} # not required. Creator name.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.
down_response: ${13:undefined} # not required. Response to the client query when the gslb service is down.

application_persistence_profile_ref: ${14:undefined} # not required. The federated application persistence associated with gslbservice site persistence functionality.,It is a reference to an object of type applicationpersistenceprofile.,Field introduced in 17.2.1.
groups: ${15:undefined} # not required. Select list of pools belonging to this gslb service.
tenant: ${16:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

use_edns_client_subnet: ${17:undefined} # not required. Use the client ip subnet from the edns option as source ipaddress for client geo-location and consistent hash algorithm.,Default is true.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

min_members: ${18:undefined} # not required. The minimum number of members to distribute traffic to.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Special values are 0 - 'disable'.,Field introduced in 17.2.4.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
description: ${19:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.

wildcard_match: ${20:undefined} # not required. Enable wild-card match of fqdn  if an exact match is not found in the dns table, the longest match is chosen by wild-carding the fqdn in the dns,request.,Default is false.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
ttl: ${21:undefined} # not required. Ttl value (in seconds) for records served for this gslb service by the dns service.,Allowed values are 1-86400.,Units(SEC).
avi_api_update_method: ${22|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
password: ${23:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
api_version: ${24:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
domain_names: ${25:undefined} # not required. Fully qualified domain name of the gslb service.

site_persistence_enabled: ${26:undefined} # not required. Enable site-persistence for the gslbservice.,Field introduced in 17.2.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_api_patch_op: ${27|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${28:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the gslb service.
controller: ${29:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${30:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${31|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${32:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

controller_health_status_enabled: ${33:undefined} # not required. Gs member's overall health status is derived based on a combination of controller and datapath health-status inputs.,Note that the datapath status is determined by the association of health monitor profiles.,Only the controller provided status is determined through this configuration.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
