avi_api_patch_op: ${13|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${14:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the microservice group.
controller: ${15:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${16:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${17|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${18:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_network.description: Module for setup of Network Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_network:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
vrf_context_ref: ${3:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type vrfcontext.
vcenter_dvs: ${4:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set vcenter_dvs.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

exclude_discovered_subnets: ${5:undefined} # not required. When selected, excludes all discovered subnets in this network from consideration for virtual service placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
configured_subnets: ${6:undefined} # not required. List of subnet.
dhcp_enabled: ${7:undefined} # not required. Select the ip address management scheme for this network.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
tenant_ref: ${8:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
state: ${9|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
url: ${10:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
password: ${11:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
cloud_ref: ${12:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
avi_api_update_method: ${13|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
avi_credentials: ${14:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
api_version: ${15:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${16:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${17:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${18|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${19:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
controller: ${20:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
vimgrnw_ref: ${21:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type vimgrnwruntime.
synced_from_se: ${22:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set synced_from_se.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
username: ${23:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_networkprofile.description: Module for setup of NetworkProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_networkprofile:
profile: ${1:undefined} # required. Networkprofileunion settings for networkprofile.
name: ${2:undefined} # required. The name of the network profile.
tenant_ref: ${3:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${4:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
password: ${5:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_credentials: ${6:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_update_method: ${7|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${8:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
api_context: ${9:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
tenant_uuid: ${10:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${11:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${12|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${13:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the network profile.
controller: ${14:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${15:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${16|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${17:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_networksecuritypolicy.description: Module for setup of NetworkSecurityPolicy Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_networksecuritypolicy:
rules: ${1:undefined} # not required. List of networksecurityrule.
tenant_ref: ${2:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${3:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
password: ${4:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_credentials: ${5:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_update_method: ${6|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${7:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
api_context: ${8:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
tenant_uuid: ${9:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${10:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
created_by: ${11:undefined} # not required. Creator name.
avi_api_patch_op: ${12|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${13:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
cloud_config_cksum: ${14:undefined} # not required. Checksum of cloud configuration for network sec policy.,Internally set by cloud connector.
controller: ${15:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${16:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${17|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${18:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
name: ${19:undefined} # not required. Name of the object.

avi_pkiprofile.description: Module for setup of PKIProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_pkiprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the pki profile.

crl_check: ${2:undefined} # not required. When enabled, avi will verify via crl checks that certificates in the trust chain have not been revoked.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

is_federated: ${4:undefined} # not required. This field describes the object's replication scope.,If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines.,If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_credentials: ${5:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
created_by: ${6:undefined} # not required. Creator name.
ca_certs: ${7:undefined} # not required. List of certificate authorities (root and intermediate) trusted that is used for certificate validation.
crls: ${8:undefined} # not required. Certificate revocation lists.
url: ${9:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
tenant_ref: ${10:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
password: ${11:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

validate_only_leaf_crl: ${12:undefined} # not required. When enabled, avi will only validate the revocation status of the leaf certificate using crl.,To enable validation for the entire chain, disable this option and provide all the relevant crls.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
avi_api_update_method: ${13|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${14:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${15:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${16:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${17|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${18:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
controller: ${19:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

ignore_peer_chain: ${20:undefined} # not required. When enabled, avi will not trust intermediate and root certs presented by a client.,Instead, only the chain certs configured in the certificate authority section will be used to verify trust of the client's cert.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
state: ${21|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${22:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_pool.description: Module for setup of Pool Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_pool:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. The name of the pool.
nsx_securitygroup: ${2:undefined} # not required. A list of nsx service groups where the servers for the pool are created.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
lb_algorithm_consistent_hash_hdr: ${3:undefined} # not required. Http header name to be used for the hash key.

vrf_ref: ${4:undefined} # not required. Virtual routing context that the pool is bound to.,This is used to provide the isolation of the set of networks the pool is attached to.,The pool inherits the virtual routing conext of the virtual service, and this field is used only internally, and is set by pb-transform.,It is a reference to an object of type vrfcontext.
api_version: ${5:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

capacity_estimation_ttfb_thresh: ${6:undefined} # not required. The maximum time-to-first-byte of a server.,Allowed values are 1-5000.,Special values are 0 - 'automatic'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.,Units(MILLISECONDS).
gslb_sp_enabled: ${7:undefined} # not required. Indicates if the pool is a site-persistence pool.,Field introduced in 17.2.1.

fewest_tasks_feedback_delay: ${8:undefined} # not required. Periodicity of feedback for fewest tasks server selection algorithm.,Allowed values are 1-300.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.,Units(SEC).
tenant_uuid: ${9:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
created_by: ${10:undefined} # not required. Creator name.
autoscale_networks: ${11:undefined} # not required. Network ids for the launch configuration.

lb_algorithm_hash: ${12:undefined} # not required. Criteria used as a key for determining the hash between the client and  server.,Enum options - LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS_AND_PORT,,LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_URI, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_CUSTOM_HEADER, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_CUSTOM_STRING.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS.

lb_algorithm: ${13:undefined} # not required. The load balancing algorithm will pick a server within the pool's list of available servers.,Enum options - LB_ALGORITHM_LEAST_CONNECTIONS, LB_ALGORITHM_ROUND_ROBIN, LB_ALGORITHM_FASTEST_RESPONSE, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH,,LB_ALGORITHM_LEAST_LOAD, LB_ALGORITHM_FEWEST_SERVERS, LB_ALGORITHM_RANDOM, LB_ALGORITHM_FEWEST_TASKS, LB_ALGORITHM_NEAREST_SERVER,,LB_ALGORITHM_CORE_AFFINITY.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as LB_ALGORITHM_LEAST_CONNECTIONS.

inline_health_monitor: ${14:undefined} # not required. The passive monitor will monitor client to server connections and requests and adjust traffic load to servers based on successful responses.,This may alter the expected behavior of the lb method, such as round robin.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

graceful_disable_timeout: ${15:undefined} # not required. Used to gracefully disable a server.,Virtual service waits for the specified time before terminating the existing connections  to the servers that are disabled.,Allowed values are 1-7200.,Special values are 0 - 'immediate', -1 - 'infinite'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.,Units(MIN).
apic_epg_name: ${16:undefined} # not required. Synchronize cisco apic epg members with pool servers.

default_server_port: ${17:undefined} # not required. Traffic sent to servers will use this destination server port unless overridden by the server's specific port attribute.,The ssl checkbox enables avi to server encryption.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 80.

placement_networks: ${18:undefined} # not required. Manually select the networks and subnets used to provide reachability to the pool's servers.,Specify the subnet using the following syntax  10-1-1-0/24.,Use static routes in vrf configuration when pool servers are not directly connected butroutable from the service engine.
cloud_ref: ${19:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
username: ${20:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

server_name: ${21:undefined} # not required. Fully qualified dns hostname which will be used in the tls sni extension in server connections if sni is enabled.,If no value is specified, avi will use the incoming host header instead.
tenant: ${22:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
password: ${23:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
external_autoscale_groups: ${24:undefined} # not required. Names of external auto-scale groups for pool servers.,Currently available only for aws and azure.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.
autoscale_policy_ref: ${25:undefined} # not required. Reference to server autoscale policy.,It is a reference to an object of type serverautoscalepolicy.
cloud_config_cksum: ${26:undefined} # not required. Checksum of cloud configuration for pool.,Internally set by cloud connector.

max_concurrent_connections_per_server: ${27:undefined} # not required. The maximum number of concurrent connections allowed to each server within the pool.,Note  applied value will be no less than the number of service engines that the pool is placed on.,If set to 0, no limit is applied.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
state: ${28|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.

sni_enabled: ${29:undefined} # not required. Enable tls sni for server connections.,If disabled, avi will not send the sni extension as part of the handshake.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
east_west: ${30:undefined} # not required. Inherited config from virtualservice.
ab_pool: ${31:undefined} # not required. A/b pool configuration.

servers: ${32:undefined} # not required. The pool directs load balanced traffic to this list of destination servers.,The servers can be configured by ip address, name, network or via ip address group.

autoscale_launch_config_ref: ${33:undefined} # not required. If configured then avi will trigger orchestration of pool server creation and deletion.,It is only supported for container clouds like mesos, opensift, kubernates, docker etc.,It is a reference to an object of type autoscalelaunchconfig.
server_auto_scale: ${34:undefined} # not required. Server autoscale.,Not used anymore.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
ab_priority: ${35:undefined} # not required. Priority of this pool in a a-b pool pair.,Internally used.

health_monitor_refs: ${36:undefined} # not required. Verify server health by applying one or more health monitors.,Active monitors generate synthetic traffic from each service engine and mark a server up or down based on the response.,The passive monitor listens only to client to server communication.,It raises or lowers the ratio of traffic destined to a server based on successful responses.,It is a reference to an object of type healthmonitor.
capacity_estimation: ${37:undefined} # not required. Inline estimation of capacity of servers.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

ssl_profile_ref: ${38:undefined} # not required. When enabled, avi re-encrypts traffic to the backend servers.,The specific ssl profile defines which ciphers and ssl versions will be supported.,It is a reference to an object of type sslprofile.
max_conn_rate_per_server: ${39:undefined} # not required. Rate limit connections to each server.

networks: ${40:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) networks designated as containing servers for this pool.,The servers may be further narrowed down by a filter.,This field is used internally by avi, not editable by the user.
a_pool: ${41:undefined} # not required. Name of container cloud application that constitutes a pool in a a-b pool configuration, if different from vs app.
controller: ${42:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
description: ${43:undefined} # not required. A description of the pool.

fail_action: ${44:undefined} # not required. Enable an action - close connection, http redirect or local http response - when a pool failure happens.,By default, a connection will be closed, in case the pool experiences a failure.
ssl_key_and_certificate_ref: ${45:undefined} # not required. Service engines will present a client ssl certificate to the server.,It is a reference to an object of type sslkeyandcertificate.
url: ${46:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
avi_credentials: ${47:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
prst_hdr_name: ${48:undefined} # not required. Header name for custom header persistence.
tenant_ref: ${49:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

use_service_port: ${50:undefined} # not required. Do not translate the client's destination port when sending the connection to the server.,The pool or servers specified service port will still be used for health monitoring.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

application_persistence_profile_ref: ${51:undefined} # not required. Persistence will ensure the same user sticks to the same server for a desired duration of time.,It is a reference to an object of type applicationpersistenceprofile.
ipaddrgroup_ref: ${52:undefined} # not required. Use list of servers from ip address group.,It is a reference to an object of type ipaddrgroup.

enabled: ${53:undefined} # not required. Enable or disable the pool.,Disabling will terminate all open connections and pause health monitors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
avi_api_update_method: ${54|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.

domain_name: ${55:undefined} # not required. Comma separated list of domain names which will be used to verify the common names or subject alternative names presented by server certificates.,It is performed only when common name check host_check_enabled is enabled.

lookup_server_by_name: ${56:undefined} # not required. Allow server lookup by name.,Field introduced in 17.1.11,17.2.4.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
api_context: ${57:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

request_queue_depth: ${58:undefined} # not required. Minimum number of requests to be queued when pool is full.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 128.
pki_profile_ref: ${59:undefined} # not required. Avi will validate the ssl certificate present by a server against the selected pki profile.,It is a reference to an object of type pkiprofile.

connection_ramp_duration: ${60:undefined} # not required. Duration for which new connections will be gradually ramped up to a server recently brought online.,Useful for lb algorithms that are least connection based.,Allowed values are 1-300.,Special values are 0 - 'immediate'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.,Units(MIN).
server_count: ${61:undefined} # not required. Number of server_count.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
request_queue_enabled: ${62:undefined} # not required. Enable request queue when pool is full.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_api_patch_op: ${63|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${64:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the pool.

host_check_enabled: ${65:undefined} # not required. Enable common name check for server certificate.,If enabled and no explicit domain name is specified, avi will use the incoming host header to do the match.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

rewrite_host_header_to_server_name: ${66:undefined} # not required. Rewrite incoming host header to server name of the server to which the request is proxied.,Enabling this feature rewrites host header for requests to all servers in the pool.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
server_reselect: ${67:undefined} # not required. Server reselect configuration for http requests.

lb_algorithm_core_nonaffinity: ${68:undefined} # not required. Degree of non-affinity for core afffinity based server selection.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.

rewrite_host_header_to_sni: ${69:undefined} # not required. If sni server name is specified, rewrite incoming host header to the sni server name.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

avi_poolgroup.description: Module for setup of PoolGroup Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_poolgroup:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. The name of the pool group.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
avi_credentials: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
tenant_ref: ${4:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

deployment_policy_ref: ${5:undefined} # not required. When setup autoscale manager will automatically promote new pools into production when deployment goals are met.,It is a reference to an object of type poolgroupdeploymentpolicy.
created_by: ${6:undefined} # not required. Name of the user who created the object.

min_servers: ${7:undefined} # not required. The minimum number of servers to distribute traffic to.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Special values are 0 - 'disable'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

priority_labels_ref: ${8:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the priority labels.,If not provided, pool group member priority label will be interpreted as a number with a larger number considered higher priority.,It is a reference to an object of type prioritylabels.
state: ${9|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
description: ${10:undefined} # not required. Description of pool group.
password: ${11:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
cloud_ref: ${12:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
avi_api_update_method: ${13|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${14:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${15:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${16:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${17|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.

fail_action: ${18:undefined} # not required. Enable an action - close connection, http redirect, or local http response - when a pool group failure happens.,By default, a connection will be closed, in case the pool group experiences a failure.

implicit_priority_labels: ${19:undefined} # not required. Whether an implicit set of priority labels is generated.,Field introduced in 17.1.9,17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
cloud_config_cksum: ${20:undefined} # not required. Checksum of cloud configuration for poolgroup.,Internally set by cloud connector.
controller: ${21:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${22:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
members: ${23:undefined} # not required. List of pool group members object of type poolgroupmember.
username: ${24:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: ${25:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the pool group.

avi_poolgroupdeploymentpolicy.description: Module for setup of PoolGroupDeploymentPolicy Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_poolgroupdeploymentpolicy:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. The name of the pool group deployment policy.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

target_test_traffic_ratio: ${3:undefined} # not required. Target traffic ratio before pool is made production.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.,Units(RATIO).

evaluation_duration: ${4:undefined} # not required. Duration of evaluation period for automatic deployment.,Allowed values are 60-86400.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).
scheme: ${5:undefined} # not required. Deployment scheme.,Enum options - BLUE_GREEN, CANARY.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as BLUE_GREEN.

auto_disable_old_prod_pools: ${6:undefined} # not required. It will automatically disable old production pools once there is a new production candidate.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
rules: ${7:undefined} # not required. List of pgdeploymentrule.
tenant_ref: ${8:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${9:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.

avi_scheduler.description: Module for setup of Scheduler Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_scheduler:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of scheduler.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
avi_credentials: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.

frequency_unit: ${4:undefined} # not required. Unit at which custom scheduler will run.,Enum options - SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_MIN, SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_HOUR, SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_DAY, SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_WEEK,,SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_MONTH.
backup_config_ref: ${5:undefined} # not required. Backup configuration to be executed by this scheduler.,It is a reference to an object of type backupconfiguration.
enabled: ${6:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set enabled.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
end_date_time: ${7:undefined} # not required. Scheduler end date and time.
tenant_ref: ${8:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
start_date_time: ${9:undefined} # not required. Scheduler start date and time.
password: ${10:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_api_update_method: ${11|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
run_script_ref: ${12:undefined} # not required. Control script to be executed by this scheduler.,It is a reference to an object of type alertscriptconfig.
api_version: ${13:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${14:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
frequency: ${15:undefined} # not required. Frequency at which custom scheduler will run.,Allowed values are 0-60.
tenant: ${16:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${17|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${18:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.

scheduler_action: ${19:undefined} # not required. Define scheduler action.,Enum options - SCHEDULER_ACTION_RUN_A_SCRIPT, SCHEDULER_ACTION_BACKUP.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SCHEDULER_ACTION_BACKUP.
controller: ${20:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${21:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${22|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${23:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
run_mode: ${24:undefined} # not required. Scheduler run mode.,Enum options - RUN_MODE_PERIODIC, RUN_MODE_AT, RUN_MODE_NOW.

se_runtime_properties: ${10:undefined} # not required. Seruntimeproperties settings for seproperties.
