avi_serverautoscalepolicy.description: Module for setup of ServerAutoScalePolicy Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_serverautoscalepolicy:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
use_predicted_load: ${3:undefined} # not required. Use predicted load rather than current load.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_credentials: ${4:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.

max_scaleout_adjustment_step: ${5:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of servers to scaleout simultaneously.,The actual number of servers to scaleout is chosen such that target number of servers is always less than or equal to the max_size.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

scaleout_cooldown: ${6:undefined} # not required. Cooldown period during which no new scaleout is triggered to allow previous scaleout to successfully complete.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).
scaleout_alertconfig_refs: ${7:undefined} # not required. Trigger scaleout when alerts due to any of these alert configurations are raised.,It is a reference to an object of type alertconfig.
controller: ${8:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

scalein_cooldown: ${9:undefined} # not required. Cooldown period during which no new scalein is triggered to allow previous scalein to successfully complete.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).

intelligent_scalein_margin: ${10:undefined} # not required. Maximum extra capacity as percentage of load used by the intelligent scheme.,Scalein is triggered when available capacity is more than this margin.,Allowed values are 1-99.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 40.
tenant_ref: ${11:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${12:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
max_size: ${13:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of servers after scaleout.,Allowed values are 0-400.
avi_api_update_method: ${14|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
password: ${15:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
api_version: ${16:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${17:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${18:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

intelligent_autoscale: ${19:undefined} # not required. Use avi intelligent autoscale algorithm where autoscale is performed by comparing load on the pool against estimated capacity of all the servers.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_api_patch_op: ${20|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${21:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
min_size: ${22:undefined} # not required. No scale-in happens once number of operationally up servers reach min_servers.,Allowed values are 0-400.

max_scalein_adjustment_step: ${23:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of servers to scalein simultaneously.,The actual number of servers to scalein is chosen such that target number of servers is always more than or equal to the min_size.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
url: ${24:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${25|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${26:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

intelligent_scaleout_margin: ${27:undefined} # not required. Minimum extra capacity as percentage of load used by the intelligent scheme.,Scaleout is triggered when available capacity is less than this margin.,Allowed values are 1-99.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.
scalein_alertconfig_refs: ${28:undefined} # not required. Trigger scalein when alerts due to any of these alert configurations are raised.,It is a reference to an object of type alertconfig.

avi_serviceengine.description: Module for setup of ServiceEngine Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_serviceengine:
api_context: ${1:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
availability_zone: ${2:undefined} # not required. Availability_zone of serviceengine.
avi_credentials: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
se_group_ref: ${4:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type serviceenginegroup.
mgmt_vnic: ${5:undefined} # not required. Vnic settings for serviceengine.
flavor: ${6:undefined} # not required. Flavor of serviceengine.
controller: ${7:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
controller_created: ${8:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set controller_created.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
name: ${9:undefined} # not required. Name of the object.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as VM name unknown.

enable_state: ${10:undefined} # not required. Inorder to disable se set this field appropriately.,Enum options - SE_STATE_ENABLED, SE_STATE_DISABLED_FOR_PLACEMENT, SE_STATE_DISABLED, SE_STATE_DISABLED_FORCE.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SE_STATE_ENABLED.
tenant_ref: ${11:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

container_type: ${12:undefined} # not required. Enum options - container_type_bridge, container_type_host, container_type_host_dpdk.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as CONTAINER_TYPE_HOST.
container_mode: ${13:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set container_mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
password: ${14:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
cloud_ref: ${15:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
avi_api_update_method: ${16|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
controller_ip: ${17:undefined} # not required. Controller_ip of serviceengine.
api_version: ${18:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${19:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${20:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
hypervisor: ${21:undefined} # not required. Enum options - default, vmware_esx, kvm, vmware_vsan, xen.
resources: ${22:undefined} # not required. Seresources settings for serviceengine.
data_vnics: ${23:undefined} # not required. List of vnic.
host_ref: ${24:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type vimgrhostruntime.
avi_api_patch_op: ${25|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
url: ${26:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${27|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${28:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: ${29:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.

avi_serviceenginegroup.description: Module for setup of ServiceEngineGroup Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_serviceenginegroup:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.

aggressive_failure_detection: ${2:undefined} # not required. Enable aggressive failover configuration for ha.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

se_probe_port: ${3:undefined} # not required. Tcp port on se where echo service will be run.,Field introduced in 17.2.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 7.
openstack_mgmt_network_uuid: ${4:undefined} # not required. Management network uuid.

disable_gro: ${5:undefined} # not required. Disable generic receive offload (gro) in dpdk poll-mode driver packet receive path.,Gro is on by default on nics that do not support lro (large receive offload) or do not gain performance boost from lro.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

se_tunnel_mode: ${6:undefined} # not required. Determines if dsr from secondary se is active or not  0  automatically determine based on hypervisor type.,1  disable dsr unconditionally.,~[0,1]  enable dsr unconditionally.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
instance_flavor: ${7:undefined} # not required. Instance/flavor type for se instance.

se_remote_punt_udp_port: ${8:undefined} # not required. Udp port for punted packets in docker bridge mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1501.

vs_scalein_timeout: ${9:undefined} # not required. Time to wait for the scaled in se to drain existing flows before marking the scalein done.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.,Units(SEC).

vcenter_folder: ${10:undefined} # not required. Folder to place all the service engine virtual machines in vcenter.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as AviSeFolder.

extra_config_multiplier: ${11:undefined} # not required. Multiplier for extra config to support large vs/pool config.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.

hm_on_standby: ${12:undefined} # not required. Enable active health monitoring from the standby se for all placed virtual services.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

os_reserved_memory: ${13:undefined} # not required. Amount of extra memory to be reserved for use by the operating system on a service engine.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

se_udp_encap_ipc: ${14:undefined} # not required. Determines if se-se ipc messages are encapsulated in an udp header  0  automatically determine based on hypervisor type.,1  use udp encap unconditionally.,~[0,1]  don't use udp encap.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
password: ${15:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

disable_csum_offloads: ${16:undefined} # not required. Stop using tcp/udp and ip checksum offload features of nics.,Field introduced in 17.1.14, 17.2.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

significant_log_throttle: ${17:undefined} # not required. This setting limits the number of significant logs generated per second per core on this se.,Default is 100 logs per second.,Set it to zero (0) to disable throttling.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.,Units(PER_SECOND).

license_type: ${18:undefined} # not required. If no license type is specified then default license enforcement for the cloud type is chosen.,Enum options - LIC_BACKEND_SERVERS, LIC_SOCKETS, LIC_CORES, LIC_HOSTS, LIC_SE_BANDWIDTH.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.

se_deprovision_delay: ${19:undefined} # not required. Duration to preserve unused service engine virtual machines before deleting them.,If traffic to a virtual service were to spike up abruptly, this se would still be available to be utilized again rather than creating a new se.,If this value is set to 0, controller will never delete any ses and administrator has to manually cleanup unused ses.,Allowed values are 0-525600.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 120.,Units(MIN).
tenant: ${20:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

async_ssl_threads: ${21:undefined} # not required. Number of async ssl threads per se_dp.,Allowed values are 1-16.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

vs_scaleout_timeout: ${22:undefined} # not required. Time to wait for the scaled out se to become ready before marking the scaleout done.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.,Units(SEC).
custom_tag: ${23:undefined} # not required. Custom tag will be used to create the tags for se instance in aws.,Note this is not the same as the prefix for se name.

se_ipc_udp_port: ${24:undefined} # not required. Udp port for se_dp ipc in docker bridge mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1500.
se_dos_profile: ${25:undefined} # not required. Dosthresholdprofile settings for serviceenginegroup.

auto_rebalance_interval: ${26:undefined} # not required. Frequency of rebalance, if 'auto rebalance' is enabled.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.,Units(SEC).
url: ${27:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${28|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.

vcenter_datastores_include: ${29:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set vcenter_datastores_include.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

floating_intf_ip: ${30:undefined} # not required. If serviceenginegroup is configured for legacy 1+1 active standby ha mode, floating ip's will be advertised only by the active se in the pair.,Virtual services in this group must be disabled/enabled for any changes to the floating ip's to take effect.,Only active se hosting vs tagged with active standby se 1 tag will advertise this floating ip when manual load distribution is enabled.

disk_per_se: ${31:undefined} # not required. Amount of disk space for each of the service engine virtual machines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.,Units(GB).
api_context: ${32:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

per_app: ${33:undefined} # not required. Per-app se mode is designed for deploying dedicated load balancers per app (vs).,In this mode, each se is limited to a max of 2 vss.,Vcpus in per-app ses count towards licensing usage at 25% rate.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

se_bandwidth_type: ${34:undefined} # not required. Select the se bandwidth for the bandwidth license.,Enum options - SE_BANDWIDTH_UNLIMITED, SE_BANDWIDTH_25M, SE_BANDWIDTH_200M, SE_BANDWIDTH_1000M, SE_BANDWIDTH_10000M.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.

min_cpu_usage: ${35:undefined} # not required. When cpu usage on an se falls below the minimum threshold, virtual services hosted on the se may be consolidated onto other underutilized ses.,After consolidation, unused service engines may then be eligible for deletion.,Allowed values are 20-60.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.,Units(PERCENT).

se_tunnel_udp_port: ${36:undefined} # not required. Udp port for tunneled packets from secondary to primary se in docker bridge mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1550.
active_standby: ${37:undefined} # not required. Service engines in active/standby mode for ha failover.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

auto_rebalance_criteria: ${38:undefined} # not required. Set of criteria for se auto rebalance.,Enum options - SE_AUTO_REBALANCE_CPU, SE_AUTO_REBALANCE_PPS, SE_AUTO_REBALANCE_MBPS, SE_AUTO_REBALANCE_OPEN_CONNS, SE_AUTO_REBALANCE_CPS.,Field introduced in 17.2.3.

algo: ${39:undefined} # not required. In compact placement, virtual services are placed on existing ses until max_vs_per_se limit is reached.,Enum options - PLACEMENT_ALGO_PACKED, PLACEMENT_ALGO_DISTRIBUTED.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as PLACEMENT_ALGO_PACKED.

flow_table_new_syn_max_entries: ${40:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of flow table entries that have not completed tcp three-way handshake yet.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
hardwaresecuritymodulegroup_ref: ${41:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type hardwaresecuritymodulegroup.
mem_reserve: ${42:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set mem_reserve.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

connection_memory_percentage: ${43:undefined} # not required. Percentage of memory for connection state.,This will come at the expense of memory used for http in-memory cache.,Allowed values are 10-90.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.,Units(PERCENT).
mgmt_subnet: ${44:undefined} # not required. Management subnet to use for avi service engines.

auto_redistribute_active_standby_load: ${45:undefined} # not required. Redistribution of virtual services from the takeover se to the replacement se can cause momentary traffic loss.,If the auto-redistribute load option is left in its default off state, any desired rebalancing requires calls to rest api.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
allow_burst: ${46:undefined} # not required. Allow ses to be created using burst license.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.

cpu_socket_affinity: ${47:undefined} # not required. Allocate all the cpu cores for the service engine virtual machines  on the same cpu socket.,Applicable only for vcenter cloud.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant_ref: ${48:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

archive_shm_limit: ${49:undefined} # not required. Amount of se memory in gb until which shared memory is collected in core archive.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 8.,Units(GB).

se_thread_multiplier: ${50:undefined} # not required. Multiplier for se threads based on vcpu.,Allowed values are 1-10.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
openstack_availability_zones: ${51:undefined} # not required. Field introduced in 17.1.1.
async_ssl: ${52:undefined} # not required. Ssl handshakes will be handled by dedicated ssl threads.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

waf_mempool_size: ${53:undefined} # not required. Memory pool size used for waf.,Field introduced in 17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 64.,Units(KB).
enable_routing: ${54:undefined} # not required. Enable routing for this serviceenginegroup .,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
iptables: ${55:undefined} # not required. Iptable rules.

enable_vip_on_all_interfaces: ${56:undefined} # not required. Enable vip on all interfaces of se.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

host_gateway_monitor: ${57:undefined} # not required. Enable the host gateway monitor when service engine is deployed as docker container.,Disabled by default.,Field introduced in 17.2.4.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
vcenter_clusters: ${58:undefined} # not required. Vcenterclusters settings for serviceenginegroup.

vs_host_redundancy: ${59:undefined} # not required. Ensure primary and secondary service engines are deployed on different physical hosts.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

host_attribute_value: ${60:undefined} # not required. Value of a (key, value) pair identifying a label for a set of nodes usually in container clouds.,Needs to be specified together with host_attribute_key.

se_vs_hb_max_pkts_in_batch: ${61:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of aggregated vs heartbeat packets to send in a batch.,Allowed values are 1-256.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 8.
buffer_se: ${62:undefined} # not required. Excess service engine capacity provisioned for ha failover.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

auto_rebalance: ${63:undefined} # not required. If set, virtual services will be automatically migrated when load on an se is less than minimum or more than maximum thresholds.,Only alerts are generated when the auto_rebalance is not set.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
custom_securitygroups_data: ${64:undefined} # not required. Custom security groups to be associated with data vnics for se instances in openstack and aws clouds.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.

ignore_rtt_threshold: ${65:undefined} # not required. Ignore rtt samples if it is above threshold.,Field introduced in 17.1.6,17.2.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5000.,Units(MILLISECONDS).
tenant_uuid: ${66:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

advertise_backend_networks: ${67:undefined} # not required. Advertise reach-ability of backend server networks via adc through bgp for default gateway feature.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

ingress_access_data: ${68:undefined} # not required. Program se security group ingress rules to allow vip data access from remote cidr type.,Enum options - SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_NONE, SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_ALL, SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_VPC.,Field introduced in 17.1.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_ALL.

max_cpu_usage: ${69:undefined} # not required. When cpu usage on an se exceeds this threshold, virtual services hosted on this se may be rebalanced to other ses to reduce load.,A new se may be created as part of this process.,Allowed values are 40-90.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 80.,Units(PERCENT).
custom_securitygroups_mgmt: ${70:undefined} # not required. Custom security groups to be associated with management vnic for se instances in openstack and aws clouds.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.

se_sb_threads: ${71:undefined} # not required. Number of sideband threads per se.,Allowed values are 1-128.,Field introduced in 16.5.2, 17.1.9, 17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

license_tier: ${72:undefined} # not required. Specifies the license tier which would be used.,This field by default inherits the value from cloud.,Enum options - ENTERPRISE_16, ENTERPRISE_18.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.
waf_mempool: ${73:undefined} # not required. Enable memory pool for waf.,Field introduced in 17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
cloud_ref: ${74:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.

host_attribute_key: ${75:undefined} # not required. Key of a (key, value) pair identifying a label for a set of nodes usually in container clouds.,Needs to be specified together with host_attribute_value.,Ses can be configured differently including ha modes across different se groups.,May also be used for isolation between different classes of virtualservices.,Virtualservices' se group may be specified via annotations/labels.,A openshift/kubernetes namespace maybe annotated with a matching se group label as openshift.io/node-selector  apptype=prod.,When multiple se groups are used in a cloud with host attributes specified,just a single se group can exist as a match-all se group without a,host_attribute_key.

num_flow_cores_sum_changes_to_ignore: ${76:undefined} # not required. Number of changes in num flow cores sum to ignore.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 8.

memory_per_se: ${77:undefined} # not required. Amount of memory for each of the service engine virtual machines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2048.
vcenter_hosts: ${78:undefined} # not required. Vcenterhosts settings for serviceenginegroup.

max_scaleout_per_vs: ${79:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of active service engines for the virtual service.,Allowed values are 1-64.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.
cpu_reserve: ${80:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set cpu_reserve.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

placement_mode: ${81:undefined} # not required. If placement mode is 'auto', virtual services are automatically placed on service engines.,Enum options - PLACEMENT_MODE_AUTO.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as PLACEMENT_MODE_AUTO.

dedicated_dispatcher_core: ${82:undefined} # not required. Dedicate the core that handles packet receive/transmit from the network to just the dispatching function.,Don't use it for tcp/ip and ssl functions.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

distribute_load_active_standby: ${83:undefined} # not required. Use both the active and standby service engines for virtual service placement in the legacy active standby ha mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
openstack_mgmt_network_name: ${84:undefined} # not required. Avi management network name.

max_se: ${85:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of services engines in this group.,Allowed values are 0-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.
vcpus_per_se: ${86:undefined} # not required. Number of vcpus for each of the service engine virtual machines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
mgmt_network_ref: ${87:undefined} # not required. Management network to use for avi service engines.,It is a reference to an object of type network.
vcenter_datastores: ${88:undefined} # not required. List of vcenterdatastore.

max_vs_per_se: ${89:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of virtual services that can be placed on a single service engine.,East west virtual services are excluded from this limit.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.

se_sb_dedicated_core: ${90:undefined} # not required. Sideband traffic will be handled by a dedicated core.,Field introduced in 16.5.2, 17.1.9, 17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

extra_shared_config_memory: ${91:undefined} # not required. Extra config memory to support large geo db configuration.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.,Units(MB).
realtime_se_metrics: ${92:undefined} # not required. Enable or disable real time se metrics.

floating_intf_ip_se_2: ${93:undefined} # not required. If serviceenginegroup is configured for legacy 1+1 active standby ha mode, floating ip's will be advertised only by the active se in the pair.,Virtual services in this group must be disabled/enabled for any changes to the floating ip's to take effect.,Only active se hosting vs tagged with active standby se 2 tag will advertise this floating ip when manual load distribution is enabled.
se_name_prefix: ${94:undefined} # not required. Prefix to use for virtual machine name of service engines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as Avi.
avi_credentials: ${95:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
vss_placement: ${96:undefined} # not required. If set, virtual services will be placed on only a subset of the cores of an se.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.

ha_mode: ${97:undefined} # not required. High availability mode for all the virtual services using this service engine group.,Enum options - HA_MODE_SHARED_PAIR, HA_MODE_SHARED, HA_MODE_LEGACY_ACTIVE_STANDBY.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as HA_MODE_SHARED.
api_version: ${98:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

se_vs_hb_max_vs_in_pkt: ${99:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of virtualservices for which heartbeat messages are aggregated in one packet.,Allowed values are 1-1024.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 256.
service_ip_subnets: ${100:undefined} # not required. Subnets assigned to the se group.,Required for vs group placement.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
description: ${101:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.

min_scaleout_per_vs: ${102:undefined} # not required. Minimum number of active service engines for the virtual service.,Allowed values are 1-64.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
hypervisor: ${103:undefined} # not required. Override default hypervisor.,Enum options - DEFAULT, VMWARE_ESX, KVM, VMWARE_VSAN, XEN.
avi_api_update_method: ${104|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.

vs_scalein_timeout_for_upgrade: ${105:undefined} # not required. During se upgrade, time to wait for the scaled-in se to drain existing flows before marking the scalein done.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.,Units(SEC).
auto_rebalance_capacity_per_se: ${106:undefined} # not required. Capacities of se for auto rebalance for each criteria.,Field introduced in 17.2.4.

vcenter_datastore_mode: ${107:undefined} # not required. Enum options - vcenter_datastore_any, vcenter_datastore_local, vcenter_datastore_shared.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as VCENTER_DATASTORE_ANY.

non_significant_log_throttle: ${108:undefined} # not required. This setting limits the number of non-significant logs generated per second per core on this se.,Default is 100 logs per second.,Set it to zero (0) to disable throttling.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.,Units(PER_SECOND).

disable_tso: ${109:undefined} # not required. Disable tcp segmentation offload (tso) in dpdk poll-mode driver packet transmit path.,Tso is on by default on nics that support it.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

enable_vmac: ${110:undefined} # not required. Use virtual mac address for interfaces on which floating interface ips are placed.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

ingress_access_mgmt: ${111:undefined} # not required. Program se security group ingress rules to allow ssh/icmp management access from remote cidr type.,Enum options - SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_NONE, SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_ALL, SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_VPC.,Field introduced in 17.1.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SG_INGRESS_ACCESS_ALL.
avi_api_patch_op: ${112|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${113:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.

udf_log_throttle: ${114:undefined} # not required. This setting limits the number of udf logs generated per second per core on this se.,Udf logs are generated due to the configured client log filters or the rules with logging enabled.,Default is 100 logs per second.,Set it to zero (0) to disable throttling.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.,Units(PER_SECOND).
controller: ${115:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
least_load_core_selection: ${116:undefined} # not required. Select core with least load for new flow.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
openstack_availability_zone: ${117:undefined} # not required. Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
username: ${118:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

log_disksz: ${119:undefined} # not required. Maximum disk capacity (in mb) to be allocated to an se.,This is exclusively used for debug and log data.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10000.,Units(MB).

avi_snmptrapprofile.description: Module for setup of SnmpTrapProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_snmptrapprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. A user-friendly name of the snmp trap configuration.
tenant_ref: ${2:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
password: ${3:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_credentials: ${4:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_update_method: ${5|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${6:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
api_context: ${7:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
trap_servers: ${8:undefined} # not required. The ip address or hostname of the snmp trap destination server.
tenant_uuid: ${9:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${10:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${11|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${12:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the snmp trap profile object.
controller: ${13:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${14:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${15|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${16:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_sslkeyandcertificate.description: Module for setup of SSLKeyAndCertificate Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_sslkeyandcertificate:
certificate: ${1:undefined} # required. Sslcertificate settings for sslkeyandcertificate.
name: ${2:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
ca_certs: ${4:undefined} # not required. Ca certificates in certificate chain.
avi_credentials: ${5:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
key: ${6:undefined} # not required. Private key.
created_by: ${7:undefined} # not required. Creator name.

type: ${8:undefined} # not required. Enum options - ssl_certificate_type_virtualservice, ssl_certificate_type_system, ssl_certificate_type_ca.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SSL_CERTIFICATE_TYPE_VIRTUALSERVICE.
dynamic_params: ${9:undefined} # not required. Dynamic parameters needed for certificate management profile.
hardwaresecuritymodulegroup_ref: ${10:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type hardwaresecuritymodulegroup.
tenant_ref: ${11:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
enckey_base64: ${12:undefined} # not required. Encrypted private key corresponding to the private key (e.g.,Those generated by an hsm such as thales nshield).
certificate_management_profile_ref: ${13:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type certificatemanagementprofile.
password: ${14:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_api_update_method: ${15|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${16:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${17:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
key_params: ${18:undefined} # not required. Sslkeyparams settings for sslkeyandcertificate.
tenant: ${19:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
enckey_name: ${20:undefined} # not required. Name of the encrypted private key (e.g.,Those generated by an hsm such as thales nshield).
avi_api_patch_op: ${21|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${22:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
controller: ${23:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${24:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${25|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${26:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

status: ${27:undefined} # not required. Enum options - ssl_certificate_finished, ssl_certificate_pending.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SSL_CERTIFICATE_FINISHED.

avi_sslprofile.description: Module for setup of SSLProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_sslprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
accepted_versions: ${3:undefined} # not required. Set of versions accepted by the server.
tags: ${4:undefined} # not required. List of tag.
avi_credentials: ${5:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
ssl_rating: ${6:undefined} # not required. Sslrating settings for sslprofile.

accepted_ciphers: ${7:undefined} # not required. Ciphers suites represented as defined by U(http://www.openssl.org/docs/apps/ciphers.html).,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as AES:3DES:RC4.
controller: ${8:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
tenant_ref: ${9:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${10:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.

prefer_client_cipher_ordering: ${11:undefined} # not required. Prefer the ssl cipher ordering presented by the client during the ssl handshake over the one specified in the ssl profile.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_api_update_method: ${12|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
password: ${13:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
api_version: ${14:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${15:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${16:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

cipher_enums: ${17:undefined} # not required. Enum options - tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_128_gcm_sha256, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_256_gcm_sha384, tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_128_gcm_sha256,,tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_256_gcm_sha384, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha256, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha384,,tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha256, tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha384, tls_rsa_with_aes_128_gcm_sha256, tls_rsa_with_aes_256_gcm_sha384,,tls_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha256, tls_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha256, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha,,tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha, tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha, tls_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha, tls_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha,,tls_rsa_with_3des_ede_cbc_sha, tls_rsa_with_rc4_128_sha.
avi_api_patch_op: ${18|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
enable_ssl_session_reuse: ${19:undefined} # not required. Enable ssl session re-use.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

ssl_session_timeout: ${20:undefined} # not required. The amount of time before an ssl session expires.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 86400.,Units(SEC).
dhparam: ${21:undefined} # not required. Dh parameters used in ssl.,At this time, it is not configurable and is set to 2048 bits.
url: ${22:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${23|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${24:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

send_close_notify: ${25:undefined} # not required. Send 'close notify' alert message for a clean shutdown of the ssl connection.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
uuid: ${26:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.

avi_stringgroup.description: Module for setup of StringGroup Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_stringgroup:

type: ${1:undefined} # required. Type of stringgroup.,Enum options - SG_TYPE_STRING, SG_TYPE_KEYVAL.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SG_TYPE_STRING.
name: ${2:undefined} # required. Name of the string group.
tenant_ref: ${3:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${4:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
password: ${5:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_credentials: ${6:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_update_method: ${7|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
kv: ${8:undefined} # not required. Configure key value in the string group.
api_version: ${9:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
api_context: ${10:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
tenant_uuid: ${11:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${12:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${13|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${14:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the string group.
controller: ${15:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${16:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${17|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${18:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

avi_systemconfiguration.description: Module for setup of SystemConfiguration Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_systemconfiguration:
api_context: ${1:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
proxy_configuration: ${2:undefined} # not required. Proxyconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.

ssh_hmacs: ${3:undefined} # not required. Allowed hmac list for ssh to the management interface on the controller and service engines.,If this is not specified, all the default hmacs are allowed.,Ssh -q mac provides the list of default hmacs supported.
mgmt_ip_access_control: ${4:undefined} # not required. Configure ip access control for controller to restrict open access.
ntp_configuration: ${5:undefined} # not required. Ntpconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
dns_configuration: ${6:undefined} # not required. Dnsconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
snmp_configuration: ${7:undefined} # not required. Snmpconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
email_configuration: ${8:undefined} # not required. Emailconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
controller: ${9:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

default_license_tier: ${10:undefined} # not required. Specifies the default license tier which would be used by new clouds.,Enum options - ENTERPRISE_16, ENTERPRISE_18.,Field introduced in 17.2.5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as ENTERPRISE_18.
avi_credentials: ${11:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
portal_configuration: ${12:undefined} # not required. Portalconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
linux_configuration: ${13:undefined} # not required. Linuxconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
password: ${14:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_api_update_method: ${15|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${16:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${17:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
docker_mode: ${18:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set docker_mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant: ${19:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${20|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${21:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.

ssh_ciphers: ${22:undefined} # not required. Allowed ciphers list for ssh to the management interface on the controller and service engines.,If this is not specified, all the default ciphers are allowed.,Ssh -q cipher provides the list of default ciphers supported.
global_tenant_config: ${23:undefined} # not required. Tenantconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.

dns_virtualservice_refs: ${24:undefined} # not required. Dns virtualservices hosting fqdn records for applications across avi vantage.,If no virtualservices are provided, avi vantage will provide dns services for configured applications.,Switching back to avi vantage from dns virtualservices is not allowed.,It is a reference to an object of type virtualservice.
url: ${25:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${26|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${27:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
admin_auth_configuration: ${28:undefined} # not required. Adminauthconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.

avi_tenant.description: Module for setup of Tenant Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_tenant:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
local: ${2:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set local.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
description: ${4:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
password: ${5:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_credentials: ${6:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_update_method: ${7|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
api_version: ${8:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${9:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${10:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
created_by: ${11:undefined} # not required. Creator of this tenant.
avi_api_patch_op: ${12|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${13:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
controller: ${14:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
config_settings: ${15:undefined} # not required. Tenantconfiguration settings for tenant.
state: ${16|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${17:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
url: ${18:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.

avi_trafficcloneprofile.description: Module for setup of TrafficCloneProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_trafficcloneprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name for the traffic clone profile.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

preserve_client_ip: ${2:undefined} # not required. Specifies if client ip needs to be preserved to clone destination.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant_ref: ${3:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
password: ${4:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
cloud_ref: ${5:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
avi_api_update_method: ${6|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
avi_credentials: ${7:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
api_version: ${8:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
api_context: ${9:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
tenant_uuid: ${10:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${11:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
avi_api_patch_op: ${12|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
clone_servers: ${13:undefined} # not required. Field introduced in 17.1.1.
controller: ${14:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${15:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${16|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${17:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: ${18:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the traffic clone profile.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

avi_useraccountprofile.description: Module for setup of UserAccountProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_useraccountprofile:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
api_version: ${2:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
api_context: ${3:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.

max_login_failure_count: ${4:undefined} # not required. Number of login attempts before lockout.,Default is 3 attempts.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.
password: ${5:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
avi_credentials: ${6:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
avi_api_update_method: ${7|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.

max_concurrent_sessions: ${8:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of concurrent sessions allowed.,There are unlimited sessions by default.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

credentials_timeout_threshold: ${9:undefined} # not required. The time period after which credentials expire.,Default is 180 days.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 180.,Units(DAYS).
tenant_uuid: ${10:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${11:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

account_lock_timeout: ${12:undefined} # not required. Lock timeout period (in minutes).,Default is 30 minutes.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.,Units(MIN).
avi_api_patch_op: ${13|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.
uuid: ${14:undefined} # not required. Unique object identifier of the object.
controller: ${15:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
url: ${16:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${17|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${18:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

max_password_history_count: ${19:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of passwords to be maintained in the password history.,Default is 4 passwords.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.

avi_virtualservice.description: Module for setup of VirtualService Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_virtualservice:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name for the virtual service.

traffic_clone_profile_ref: ${2:undefined} # not required. Server network or list of servers for cloning traffic.,It is a reference to an object of type trafficcloneprofile.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

east_west_placement: ${3:undefined} # not required. Force placement on all se's in service group (mesos mode only).,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
http_policies: ${4:undefined} # not required. Http policies applied on the data traffic of the virtual service.
enable_rhi: ${5:undefined} # not required. Enable route health injection using the bgp config in the vrf context.

se_group_ref: ${6:undefined} # not required. The service engine group to use for this virtual service.,Moving to a new se group is disruptive to existing connections for this vs.,It is a reference to an object of type serviceenginegroup.
nsx_securitygroup: ${7:undefined} # not required. A list of nsx service groups representing the clients which can access the virtual ip of the virtual service.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
snat_ip: ${8:undefined} # not required. Nat'ted floating source ip address(es) for upstream connection to servers.
requests_rate_limit: ${9:undefined} # not required. Rate limit the incoming requests to this virtual service.
pool_group_ref: ${10:undefined} # not required. The pool group is an object that contains pools.,It is a reference to an object of type poolgroup.

avi_allocated_fip: ${11:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) fip allocated by avi in the cloud infrastructure.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

pool_ref: ${12:undefined} # not required. The pool is an object that contains destination servers and related attributes such as load-balancing and persistence.,It is a reference to an object of type pool.
client_auth: ${13:undefined} # not required. Http authentication configuration for protected resources.
subnet: ${14:undefined} # not required. Subnet providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
password: ${15:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

discovered_networks: ${16:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) discovered networks providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,This field is used internally by avi, not editable by the user.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
sideband_profile: ${17:undefined} # not required. Sideband configuration to be used for this virtualservice.it can be used for sending traffic to sideband vips for external inspection etc.
tenant: ${18:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

ign_pool_net_reach: ${19:undefined} # not required. Ignore pool servers network reachability constraints for virtual service placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

remove_listening_port_on_vs_down: ${20:undefined} # not required. Remove listening port if virtualservice is down.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

static_dns_records: ${21:undefined} # not required. List of static dns records applied to this virtual service.,These are static entries and no health monitoring is performed against the ip addresses.
network_security_policy_ref: ${22:undefined} # not required. Network security policies for the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type networksecuritypolicy.
url: ${23:undefined} # not required. Avi controller URL of the object.
state: ${24|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. The state that should be applied on the entity.
username: ${25:} # not required. Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

limit_doser: ${26:undefined} # not required. Limit potential dos attackers who exceed max_cps_per_client significantly to a fraction of max_cps_per_client for a while.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

use_bridge_ip_as_vip: ${27:undefined} # not required. Use bridge ip as vip on each host in mesos deployments.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
enable_rhi_snat: ${28:undefined} # not required. Enable route health injection for source nat'ted floating ip address using the bgp config in the vrf context.
avi_credentials: ${29:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
vh_parent_vs_uuid: ${30:undefined} # not required. Specifies the virtual service acting as virtual hosting (sni) parent.
microservice_ref: ${31:undefined} # not required. Microservice representing the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type microservice.

cloud_type: ${32:undefined} # not required. Enum options - cloud_none, cloud_vcenter, cloud_openstack, cloud_aws, cloud_vca, cloud_apic, cloud_mesos, cloud_linuxserver, cloud_docker_ucp,,cloud_rancher, cloud_oshift_k8s, cloud_azure.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as CLOUD_NONE.

discovered_network_ref: ${33:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) discovered networks providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,This field is deprecated.,It is a reference to an object of type network.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
enabled: ${34:undefined} # not required. Enable or disable the virtual service.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

ssl_sess_cache_avg_size: ${35:undefined} # not required. Expected number of ssl session cache entries (may be exceeded).,Allowed values are 1024-16383.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1024.

weight: ${36:undefined} # not required. The quality of service weight to assign to traffic transmitted from this virtual service.,A higher weight will prioritize traffic versus other virtual services sharing the same service engines.,Allowed values are 1-128.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
vip: ${37:undefined} # not required. List of virtual service ips.,While creating a 'shared vs',please use vsvip_ref to point to the shared entities.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
tenant_ref: ${38:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
fqdn: ${39:undefined} # not required. Dns resolvable, fully qualified domain name of the virtualservice.,Only one of 'fqdn' and 'dns_info' configuration is allowed.
content_rewrite: ${40:undefined} # not required. Profile used to match and rewrite strings in request and/or response body.
host_name_xlate: ${41:undefined} # not required. Translate the host name sent to the servers to this value.,Translate the host name sent from servers back to the value used by the client.

floating_subnet_uuid: ${42:undefined} # not required. If auto_allocate_floating_ip is true and more than one floating-ip subnets exist, then the subnet for the floating ip address allocation.,This field is applicable only if the virtualservice belongs to an openstack or aws cloud.,In openstack or aws cloud it is required when auto_allocate_floating_ip is selected.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

vsvip_ref: ${43:undefined} # not required. Mostly used during the creation of shared vs, this field refers to entities that can be shared across virtual services.,It is a reference to an object of type vsvip.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
network_ref: ${44:undefined} # not required. Manually override the network on which the virtual service is placed.,It is a reference to an object of type network.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
performance_limits: ${45:undefined} # not required. Optional settings that determine performance limits like max connections or bandwdith etc.
analytics_profile_ref: ${46:undefined} # not required. Specifies settings related to analytics.,It is a reference to an object of type analyticsprofile.
floating_ip: ${47:undefined} # not required. Floating ip to associate with this virtual service.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

delay_fairness: ${48:undefined} # not required. Select the algorithm for qos fairness.,This determines how multiple virtual services sharing the same service engines will prioritize traffic over a congested network.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

vh_domain_name: ${49:undefined} # not required. The exact name requested from the client's sni-enabled tls hello domain name field.,If this is a match, the parent vs will forward the connection to this child vs.

type: ${50:undefined} # not required. Specify if this is a normal virtual service, or if it is the parent or child of an sni-enabled virtual hosted virtual service.,Enum options - VS_TYPE_NORMAL, VS_TYPE_VH_PARENT, VS_TYPE_VH_CHILD.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as VS_TYPE_NORMAL.
availability_zone: ${51:undefined} # not required. Availability-zone to place the virtual service.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
connections_rate_limit: ${52:undefined} # not required. Rate limit the incoming connections to this virtual service.
service_pool_select: ${53:undefined} # not required. Select pool based on destination port.
api_version: ${54:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
ip_address: ${55:undefined} # not required. Ip address of the virtual service.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
api_context: ${56:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
created_by: ${57:undefined} # not required. Creator name.

max_cps_per_client: ${58:undefined} # not required. Maximum connections per second per client ip.,Allowed values are 10-1000.,Special values are 0- 'unlimited'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

close_client_conn_on_config_update: ${59:undefined} # not required. Close client connection on vs config update.,Field introduced in 17.2.4.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

flow_label_type: ${60:undefined} # not required. Criteria for flow labelling.,Enum options - NO_LABEL, APPLICATION_LABEL, SERVICE_LABEL.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as NO_LABEL.
dns_policies: ${61:undefined} # not required. Dns policies applied on the dns traffic of the virtual service.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

scaleout_ecmp: ${62:undefined} # not required. Disable re-distribution of flows across service engines for a virtual service.,Enable if the network itself performs flow hashing with ecmp in environments such as gcp.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

dns_info: ${63:undefined} # not required. Service discovery specific data including fully qualified domain name, type and time-to-live of the dns record.,Note that only one of fqdn and dns_info setting is allowed.
cloud_ref: ${64:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.

subnet_uuid: ${65:undefined} # not required. It represents subnet for the virtual service ip address allocation when auto_allocate_ip is true.it is only applicable in openstack or aws cloud.,This field is required if auto_allocate_ip is true.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
ipam_network_subnet: ${66:undefined} # not required. Subnet and/or network for allocating virtualservice ip by ipam provider module.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
avi_api_update_method: ${67|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
cloud_config_cksum: ${68:undefined} # not required. Checksum of cloud configuration for vs.,Internally set by cloud connector.
analytics_policy: ${69:undefined} # not required. Determines analytics settings for the application.

server_network_profile_ref: ${70:undefined} # not required. Determines the network settings profile for the server side of tcp proxied connections.,Leave blank to use the same settings as the client to vs side of the connection.,It is a reference to an object of type networkprofile.
services: ${71:undefined} # not required. List of services defined for this virtual service.

sp_pool_refs: ${72:undefined} # not required. Gslb pools used to manage site-persistence functionality.,Each site-persistence pool contains the virtualservices in all the other sites, that is auto-generated by the gslb manager.,This is a read-only field for the user.,It is a reference to an object of type pool.,Field introduced in 17.2.2.

active_standby_se_tag: ${73:undefined} # not required. This configuration only applies if the virtualservice is in legacy active standby ha mode and load distribution among active standby is enabled.,This field is used to tag the virtualservice so that virtualservices with the same tag will share the same active serviceengine.,Virtualservices with different tags will have different active serviceengines.,If one of the serviceengine's in the serviceenginegroup fails, all virtualservices will end up using the same active serviceengine.,Redistribution of the virtualservices can be either manual or automated when the failed serviceengine recovers.,Redistribution is based on the auto redistribute property of the serviceenginegroup.,Enum options - ACTIVE_STANDBY_SE_1, ACTIVE_STANDBY_SE_2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as ACTIVE_STANDBY_SE_1.

use_vip_as_snat: ${74:undefined} # not required. Use the virtual ip as the snat ip for health monitoring and sending traffic to the backend servers instead of the service engine interface ip.,The caveat of enabling this option is that the virtualservice cannot be configued in an active-active ha mode.,Dns based multi vip solution has to be used for ha & non-disruptive upgrade purposes.,Field introduced in 17.1.9,17.2.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

enable_autogw: ${75:undefined} # not required. Response traffic to clients will be sent back to the source mac address of the connection, rather than statically sent to a default gateway.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

vrf_context_ref: ${76:undefined} # not required. Virtual routing context that the virtual service is bound to.,This is used to provide the isolation of the set of networks the application is attached to.,It is a reference to an object of type vrfcontext.

auto_allocate_floating_ip: ${77:undefined} # not required. Auto-allocate floating/elastic ip from the cloud infrastructure.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
uuid: ${78:undefined} # not required. Uuid of the virtualservice.
ssl_profile_ref: ${79:undefined} # not required. Determines the set of ssl versions and ciphers to accept for ssl/tls terminated connections.,It is a reference to an object of type sslprofile.
waf_policy_ref: ${80:undefined} # not required. Waf policy for the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type wafpolicy.,Field introduced in 17.2.1.
application_profile_ref: ${81:undefined} # not required. Enable application layer specific features for the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type applicationprofile.
discovered_subnet: ${82:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) discovered subnets providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,This field is deprecated.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

service_metadata: ${83:undefined} # not required. Metadata pertaining to the service provided by this virtual service.,In openshift/kubernetes environments, egress pod info is stored.,Any user input to this field will be overwritten by avi vantage.

flow_dist: ${84:undefined} # not required. Criteria for flow distribution among ses.,Enum options - LOAD_AWARE, CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS, CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS_AND_PORT.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as LOAD_AWARE.

auto_allocate_ip: ${85:undefined} # not required. Auto-allocate vip from the provided subnet.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
description: ${86:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
vs_datascripts: ${87:undefined} # not required. Datascripts applied on the data traffic of the virtual service.
port_uuid: ${88:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) network port assigned to the virtual service ip address.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
tenant_uuid: ${89:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

ssl_key_and_certificate_refs: ${90:undefined} # not required. Select or create one or two certificates, ec and/or rsa, that will be presented to ssl/tls terminated connections.,It is a reference to an object of type sslkeyandcertificate.
avi_api_patch_op: ${91|add,replace,delete|} # not required. choices: add;replace;delete. Patch operation to use when using avi_api_update_method as patch.

network_profile_ref: ${92:undefined} # not required. Determines network settings such as protocol, tcp or udp, and related options for the protocol.,It is a reference to an object of type networkprofile.
controller: ${93:} # not required. IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

avi_allocated_vip: ${94:undefined} # not required. (internal-use) vip allocated by avi in the cloud infrastructure.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

error_page_profile_ref: ${95:undefined} # not required. Error page profile to be used for this virtualservice.this profile is used to send the custom error page to the client generated by the proxy.,It is a reference to an object of type errorpageprofile.,Field introduced in 17.2.4.

avi_vrfcontext.description: Module for setup of VrfContext Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_vrfcontext:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the object.
api_context: ${2:undefined} # not required. Avi API context that includes current session ID and CSRF Token.,This allows user to perform single login and re-use the session.
system_default: ${3:undefined} # not required. Boolean flag to set system_default.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
bgp_profile: ${4:undefined} # not required. Bgp local and peer info.
static_routes: ${5:undefined} # not required. List of staticroute.
gateway_mon: ${6:undefined} # not required. Configure ping based heartbeat check for gateway in service engines of vrf.
internal_gateway_monitor: ${7:undefined} # not required. Configure ping based heartbeat check for all default gateways in service engines of vrf.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
debugvrfcontext: ${8:undefined} # not required. Configure debug flags for vrf.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
tenant_ref: ${9:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
description: ${10:undefined} # not required. User defined description for the object.
password: ${11:} # not required. Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
cloud_ref: ${12:undefined} # not required. It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
avi_api_update_method: ${13|put,patch|} # not required. choices: put;patch. Default method for object update is HTTP PUT.,Setting to patch will override that behavior to use HTTP PATCH.
avi_credentials: ${14:undefined} # not required. Avi Credentials dictionary which can be used in lieu of enumerating Avi Controller login details.
api_version: ${15:16.4.4} # not required. Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
tenant_uuid: ${16:} # not required. UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: ${17:admin} # not required. Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
