service_capabilities: ${3:undefined} # not required. Desired service capabilities as part of network offering.
egress_default_policy: ${4|allow,deny|} # not required. choices: allow;deny. Whether the default egress policy is allow or to deny.

api_url: ${5:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

keepalive_enabled: ${6|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. If true keepalive will be turned on in the loadbalancer.,At the time of writing this has only an effect on haproxy.,the mode http and httpclose options are unset in the haproxy conf file.

api_timeout: ${7:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
specify_ip_ranges: ${8|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Wheter the network offering supports specifying IP ranges.,Defaulted to C(no) by the API if not specified.
specify_vlan: ${9|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Whether the network offering supports vlans or not.

api_secret: ${10:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
display_text: ${11:undefined} # not required. Display text of the network offerings.
api_region: ${12:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
details: ${13|internallbprovider,publiclbprovider|} # not required. choices: internallbprovider;publiclbprovider. Network offering details in key/value pairs.,with service provider as a value
conserve_mode: ${14|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Whether the network offering has IP conserve mode enabled.

api_key: ${15:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${16|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
guest_ip_type: ${17|Shared,Isolated|} # not required. choices: Shared;Isolated. Guest type of the network offering.
availability: ${18:undefined} # not required. The availability of network offering. Default value is Optional
max_connections: ${19:undefined} # not required. Maximum number of concurrent connections supported by the network offering.
service_provider: ${20:undefined} # not required. Provider to service mapping.,If not specified, the provider for the service will be mapped to the default provider on the physical network.
network_rate: ${21:undefined} # not required. Data transfer rate in megabits per second allowed.
persistent: ${22:undefined} # not required. True if network offering supports persistent networks,defaulted to false if not specified
traffic_type: ${23:Guest} # not required. The traffic type for the network offering.
state: ${24|enabled,present,disabled,absent|} # not required. choices: enabled;present;disabled;absent. State of the network offering.

supported_services: ${25|Dns,PortForwarding,Dhcp,SourceNat,UserData,Firewall,StaticNat,Vpn,Lb|} # not required. choices: Dns;PortForwarding;Dhcp;SourceNat;UserData;Firewall;StaticNat;Vpn;Lb. Services supported by the network offering.,One or more of the choices.

cs_nic.description: Manages NICs and secondary IPs of an instance on Apache CloudStack based clouds
body: cs_nic:
vm: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of instance.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${4|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${5:yes} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
vpc: ${6:undefined} # not required. Name of the VPC the C(vm) is related to.
account: ${7:undefined} # not required. Account the instance is related to.
domain: ${8:undefined} # not required. Domain the instance is related to.
zone: ${9:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone in which the instance is deployed in.,If not set, default zone is used.
project: ${10:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the instance is deployed in.
vm_guest_ip: ${11:undefined} # not required. Secondary IP address to be added to the instance nic.,If not set, the API always returns a new IP address and idempotency is not given.

api_secret: ${12:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${13:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${14|absent,present|} # not required. choices: absent;present. State of the ipaddress.
network: ${15:undefined} # not required. Name of the network.,Required to find the NIC if instance has multiple networks assigned.

api_url: ${16:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

cs_pod.description: Manages pods on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_pod:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the pod.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
gateway: ${4:null} # not required. Gateway for the Pod.,Required on C(state=present)

api_url: ${5:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
netmask: ${6:null} # not required. Netmask for the Pod.,Required on C(state=present)
id: ${7:null} # not required. uuid of the existing pod.
start_ip: ${8:null} # not required. Starting IP address for the Pod.,Required on C(state=present)
zone: ${9:null} # not required. Name of the zone in which the pod belongs to.,If not set, default zone is used.
end_ip: ${10:null} # not required. Ending IP address for the Pod.

api_secret: ${11:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${12:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${13|present,enabled,disabled,absent|} # not required. choices: present;enabled;disabled;absent. State of the pod.

api_http_method: ${14|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

cs_portforward.description: Manages port forwarding rules on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_portforward:
public_port: ${1:undefined} # required. Start public port for this rule.
ip_address: ${2:undefined} # required. Public IP address the rule is assigned to.
private_port: ${3:undefined} # required. Start private port for this rule.

api_secret: ${4:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
private_end_port: ${5:undefined} # not required. End private port for this rule.,If not specified equal C(private_port).
tags: ${6:undefined} # not required. List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).,To delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).
vpc: ${7:undefined} # not required. Name of the VPC.

api_timeout: ${8:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
account: ${9:undefined} # not required. Account the C(vm) is related to.
zone: ${10:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone in which the virtual machine is in.,If not set, default zone is used.
network: ${11:undefined} # not required. Name of the network.
vm: ${12:undefined} # not required. Name of virtual machine which we make the port forwarding rule for.,Required if C(state=present).
protocol: ${13|tcp,udp|} # not required. choices: tcp;udp. Protocol of the port forwarding rule.

api_key: ${14:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${15|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${16:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
public_end_port: ${17:undefined} # not required. End public port for this rule.,If not specified equal C(public_port).
domain: ${18:undefined} # not required. Domain the C(vm) is related to.
project: ${19:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the C(vm) is located in.
vm_guest_ip: ${20:false} # not required. VM guest NIC secondary IP address for the port forwarding rule.
api_region: ${21:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${22|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the port forwarding rule.

api_url: ${23:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
open_firewall: ${24:false} # not required. Whether the firewall rule for public port should be created, while creating the new rule.,Use M(cs_firewall) for managing firewall rules.

cs_project.description: Manages projects on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_project:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the project.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${4|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${5:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url: ${6:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
tags: ${7:null} # not required. List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).,If you want to delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).
account: ${8:null} # not required. Account the project is related to.
domain: ${9:null} # not required. Domain the project is related to.

api_secret: ${10:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
display_text: ${11:null} # not required. Display text of the project.,If not specified, C(name) will be used as C(display_text).
state: ${12|present,absent,active,suspended|} # not required. choices: present;absent;active;suspended. State of the project.
api_region: ${13:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.

cs_region.description: Manages regions on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_region:
id: ${1:undefined} # required. ID of the region.,Must be an number (int).

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
state: ${3|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the region.

api_key: ${4:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

api_secret: ${6:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_url: ${7:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
endpoint: ${8:null} # not required. Endpoint URL of the region.,Required if C(state=present)
api_region: ${9:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
name: ${10:null} # not required. Name of the region.,Required if C(state=present)

cs_resourcelimit.description: Manages resource limits on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_resourcelimit:

resource_type: ${1|instance,ip_address,volume,snapshot,template,network,vpc,cpu,memory,primary_storage,secondary_storage|} # required. choices: instance;ip_address;volume;snapshot;template;network;vpc;cpu;memory;primary_storage;secondary_storage. Type of the resource.

api_url: ${2:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
domain: ${3:null} # not required. Domain the resource is related to.
api_region: ${4:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.

api_key: ${5:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${6|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
project: ${7:null} # not required. Name of the project the resource is related to.

api_timeout: ${8:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_secret: ${9:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
limit: ${10:-1} # not required. Maximum number of the resource.,Default is unlimited C(-1).
account: ${11:null} # not required. Account the resource is related to.

cs_role.description: Manages user roles on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_role:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the role.
id: ${2:null} # not required. ID of the role.,If provided, C(id) is used as key.

api_timeout: ${3:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
description: ${4:null} # not required. Description of the role.

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

api_secret: ${6:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
role_type: ${7|User,DomainAdmin,ResourceAdmin,Admin|} # not required. choices: User;DomainAdmin;ResourceAdmin;Admin. Type of the role.,Only considered for creation.

api_key: ${8:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_url: ${9:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
state: ${10|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the role.
api_region: ${11:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.

cs_router.description: Manages routers on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_router:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the router.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
service_offering: ${3:null} # not required. Name or id of the service offering of the router.

api_key: ${4:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${6:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url: ${7:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
account: ${8:null} # not required. Account the router is related to.
domain: ${9:null} # not required. Domain the router is related to.
zone: ${10:null} # not required. Name of the zone the router is deployed in.,If not set, all zones are used.
project: ${11:null} # not required. Name of the project the router is related to.

api_secret: ${12:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${13:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${14|present,absent,started,stopped,restarted|} # not required. choices: present;absent;started;stopped;restarted. State of the router.

cs_securitygroup.description: Manages security groups on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_securitygroup:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the security group.

api_key: ${2:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_timeout: ${3:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
description: ${4:undefined} # not required. Description of the security group.

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

api_url: ${6:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
account: ${7:undefined} # not required. Account the security group is related to.
domain: ${8:undefined} # not required. Domain the security group is related to.
project: ${9:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the security group to be created in.

api_secret: ${10:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${11:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${12|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the security group.

cs_securitygroup_rule.description: Manages security group rules on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_securitygroup_rule:
security_group: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the security group the rule is related to. The security group must be existing.
user_security_group: ${2:undefined} # not required. Security group this rule is based of.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_timeout: ${4:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
type: ${5|ingress,egress|} # not required. choices: ingress;egress. Ingress or egress security group rule.
icmp_code: ${6:undefined} # not required. Error code for this icmp message. Required if C(protocol=icmp).

api_http_method: ${7|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${8:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url: ${9:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
start_port: ${10:undefined} # not required. Start port for this rule. Required if C(protocol=tcp) or C(protocol=udp).
protocol: ${11|tcp,udp,icmp,ah,esp,gre|} # not required. choices: tcp;udp;icmp;ah;esp;gre. Protocol of the security group rule.

api_secret: ${12:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
project: ${13:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the security group to be created in.
end_port: ${14:undefined} # not required. End port for this rule. Required if C(protocol=tcp) or C(protocol=udp), but C(start_port) will be used if not set.
cidr: ${15:0.0.0.0/0} # not required. CIDR (full notation) to be used for security group rule.
icmp_type: ${16:undefined} # not required. Type of the icmp message being sent. Required if C(protocol=icmp).
state: ${17|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the security group rule.
api_region: ${18:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.

cs_service_offering.description: Manages service offerings on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_service_offering:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the service offering.
memory: ${2:undefined} # not required. The total memory of the service offering in MB.
disk_iops_write_rate: ${3:undefined} # not required. IO requests write rate of the disk offering.
disk_iops_customized: ${4:false} # not required. Whether compute offering iops is custom or not.

api_secret: ${5:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_key: ${6:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

is_volatile: ${7|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Whether the virtual machine needs to be volatile or not.,Every reboot of VM the root disk is detached then destroyed and a fresh root disk is created and attached to VM.

api_url: ${8:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
bytes_write_rate: ${9:undefined} # not required. Bytes write rate of the disk offering.
cpu_number: ${10:undefined} # not required. The number of CPUs of the service offering.
disk_iops_max: ${11:undefined} # not required. Max. iops of the compute offering.
limit_cpu_usage: ${12|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Restrict the CPU usage to committed service offering.
hypervisor_snapshot_reserve: ${13:undefined} # not required. Hypervisor snapshot reserve space as a percent of a volume.,Only for managed storage using Xen or VMware.
display_text: ${14:undefined} # not required. Display text of the service offering.,If not set, C(name) will be used as C(display_text) while creating.
bytes_read_rate: ${15:undefined} # not required. Bytes read rate of the disk offering.
api_region: ${16:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
deployment_planner: ${17:undefined} # not required. The deployment planner heuristics used to deploy a VM of this offering.,If not set, the value of global config C(vm.deployment.planner) is used.
system_vm_type: ${18|domainrouter,consoleproxy,secondarystoragevm|} # not required. choices: domainrouter;consoleproxy;secondarystoragevm. The system VM type.,Required if C(is_system=true).

api_timeout: ${19:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
cpu_speed: ${20:undefined} # not required. The CPU speed of the service offering in MHz.
offer_ha: ${21|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Whether HA is set for the service offering.
storage_tags: ${22:undefined} # not required. The storage tags for this service offering.
domain: ${23:undefined} # not required. Domain the service offering is related to.,Public for all domains and subdomains if not set.
is_system: ${24|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Whether it is a system VM offering or not.
storage_type: ${25|local,shared|} # not required. choices: local;shared. The storage type of the service offering.
service_offering_details: ${26:undefined} # not required. Details for planner, used to store specific parameters.
provisioning_type: ${27|thin,sparse,fat|} # not required. choices: thin;sparse;fat. Provisioning type used to create volumes.
network_rate: ${28:undefined} # not required. Data transfer rate in Mb/s allowed.,Supported only for non-system offering and system offerings having C(system_vm_type=domainrouter).
host_tags: ${29:undefined} # not required. The host tagsfor this service offering.
state: ${30|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the service offering.

api_http_method: ${31|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
disk_iops_read_rate: ${32:undefined} # not required. IO requests read rate of the disk offering.
disk_iops_min: ${33:undefined} # not required. Min. iops of the compute offering.

cs_snapshot_policy.description: Manages volume snapshot policies on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_snapshot_policy:

schedule: ${1:undefined} # not required. Time the snapshot is scheduled. Required if C(state=present).,Format for C(interval_type=HOURLY): C(MM),Format for C(interval_type=DAILY): C(MM:HH),Format for C(interval_type=WEEKLY): C(MM:HH:DD (1-7)),Format for C(interval_type=MONTHLY): C(MM:HH:DD (1-28))

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
interval_type: ${3|hourly,daily,weekly,monthly|} # not required. choices: hourly;daily;weekly;monthly. Interval of the snapshot.
max_snaps: ${4:8} # not required. Max number of snapshots.

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
device_id: ${6:undefined} # not required. ID of the device on a VM the volume is attached to.,This will only be considered if VM has multiple DATADISK volumes.
volume: ${7:undefined} # not required. Name of the volume.,Either C(volume) or C(vm) is required.
vpc: ${8:undefined} # not required. Name of the vpc the instance is deployed in.
time_zone: ${9:UTC} # not required. Specifies a timezone for this command.
account: ${10:undefined} # not required. Account the volume is related to.
volume_type: ${11|DATADISK,ROOT|} # not required. choices: DATADISK;ROOT. Type of the volume.
domain: ${12:undefined} # not required. Domain the volume is related to.

api_secret: ${13:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
project: ${14:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the volume is related to.

api_key: ${15:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${16:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${17|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the snapshot policy.

api_url: ${18:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

vm: ${19:undefined} # not required. Name of the instance to select the volume from.,Use C(volume_type) if VM has a DATADISK and ROOT volume.,In case of C(volume_type=DATADISK), additionally use C(device_id) if VM has more than one DATADISK volume.,Either C(volume) or C(vm) is required.

cs_sshkeypair.description: Manages SSH keys on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_sshkeypair:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of public key.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${4|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

api_url: ${5:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
account: ${6:null} # not required. Account the public key is related to.
public_key: ${7:null} # not required. String of the public key.
domain: ${8:null} # not required. Domain the public key is related to.
project: ${9:null} # not required. Name of the project the public key to be registered in.

api_secret: ${10:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${11:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${12|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the public key.

cs_staticnat.description: Manages static NATs on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_staticnat:
ip_address: ${1:undefined} # required. Public IP address the static NAT is assigned to.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${4|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${5:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
vpc: ${6:null} # not required. VPC the network related to.
domain: ${7:null} # not required. Domain the static NAT is related to.
account: ${8:null} # not required. Account the static NAT is related to.
vm: ${9:null} # not required. Name of virtual machine which we make the static NAT for.,Required if C(state=present).
zone: ${10:null} # not required. Name of the zone in which the virtual machine is in.,If not set, default zone is used.
project: ${11:null} # not required. Name of the project the static NAT is related to.
vm_guest_ip: ${12:false} # not required. VM guest NIC secondary IP address for the static NAT.

api_secret: ${13:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${14:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${15|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the static NAT.
network: ${16:null} # not required. Network the IP address is related to.

api_url: ${17:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

cs_storage_pool.description: Manages Primary Storage Pools on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_storage_pool:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the storage pool.
cluster: ${2:undefined} # not required. Name of the cluster.
storage_url: ${3:undefined} # not required. URL of the storage pool.,Required if C(state=present).

api_timeout: ${4:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${5:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${6|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
scope: ${7|cluster,zone|} # not required. choices: cluster;zone. The scope of the storage pool.,Defaults to cluster when C(cluster) is provided, otherwise zone.

hypervisor: ${8|KVM,VMware,BareMetal,XenServer,LXC,HyperV,UCS,OVM,Simulator|} # not required. choices: KVM;VMware;BareMetal;XenServer;LXC;HyperV;UCS;OVM;Simulator. Required when creating a zone scoped pool.

api_url: ${9:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
storage_tags: ${10:undefined} # not required. Tags associated with this storage pool.
provider: ${11:DefaultPrimary} # not required. Name of the storage provider e.g. SolidFire, SolidFireShared, DefaultPrimary, CloudByte.
managed: ${12:undefined} # not required. Whether the storage pool should be managed by CloudStack.,Only considere on creation.
allocation_state: ${13|enabled,disabled|} # not required. choices: enabled;disabled. Allocation state of the storage pool.
zone: ${14:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone in which the host should be deployed.,If not set, default zone is used.
capacity_iops: ${15:undefined} # not required. Bytes CloudStack can provision from this storage pool.
pod: ${16:undefined} # not required. Name of the pod.

api_secret: ${17:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${18:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${19|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the storage pool.
capacity_bytes: ${20:undefined} # not required. Bytes CloudStack can provision from this storage pool.

cs_template.description: Manages templates on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_template:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the template.
password_enabled: ${2:false} # not required. True if the template supports the password reset feature.
cross_zones: ${3:false} # not required. Whether the template should be synced or removed across zones.,Only used if C(state) is present or absent.

api_secret: ${4:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
template_tag: ${5:undefined} # not required. the tag for this template.
domain: ${6:undefined} # not required. Domain the template, snapshot or VM is related to.

api_url: ${7:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
account: ${8:undefined} # not required. Account the template, snapshot or VM is related to.
is_extractable: ${9:false} # not required. True if the template or its derivatives are extractable.
is_public: ${10:false} # not required. Register the template to be publicly available to all users.,Only used if C(state) is present.
zone: ${11:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone you wish the template to be registered or deleted from.,If not specified, first found zone will be used.
api_region: ${12:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
checksum: ${13:false} # not required. The MD5 checksum value of this template.,If set, we search by checksum instead of name.
display_text: ${14:undefined} # not required. Display text of the template.
requires_hvm: ${15:false} # not required. true if this template requires HVM.
url: ${16:undefined} # not required. URL of where the template is hosted on C(state=present).,URL to which the template would be extracted on C(state=extracted).,Mutually exclusive with C(vm).
bits: ${17:64} # not required. 32 or 64 bits support.
details: ${18:undefined} # not required. Template details in key/value pairs.

api_timeout: ${19:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
is_dynamically_scalable: ${20:false} # not required. Register the template having XS/VMWare tools installed in order to support dynamic scaling of VM CPU/memory.,Only used if C(state) is present.

api_key: ${21:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${22|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
format: ${23|QCOW2,RAW,VHD,OVA|} # not required. choices: QCOW2;RAW;VHD;OVA. The format for the template.,Relevant when using C(state=present).
poll_async: ${24:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

hypervisor: ${25|KVM,VMware,BareMetal,XenServer,LXC,HyperV,UCS,OVM,Simulator|} # not required. choices: KVM;VMware;BareMetal;XenServer;LXC;HyperV;UCS;OVM;Simulator. Name the hypervisor to be used for creating the new template.,Relevant when using C(state=present).
tags: ${26:undefined} # not required. List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).,To delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).

is_ready: ${27:false} # not required. This flag is used for searching existing templates.,If set to C(true), it will only list template ready for deployment e.g. successfully downloaded and installed.,Recommended to set it to C(false).

template_filter: ${28|featured,self,selfexecutable,sharedexecutable,executable,community|} # not required. choices: featured;self;selfexecutable;sharedexecutable;executable;community. Name of the filter used to search for the template.
is_featured: ${29:false} # not required. Register the template to be featured.,Only used if C(state) is present.
snapshot: ${30:undefined} # not required. Name of the snapshot, created from the VM ROOT volume, the template will be created from.,C(vm) is required together with this argument.
mode: ${31|http_download,ftp_upload|} # not required. choices: http_download;ftp_upload. Mode for the template extraction.,Only used if C(state=extracted).
os_type: ${32:undefined} # not required. OS type that best represents the OS of this template.
project: ${33:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the template to be registered in.

vm: ${34:undefined} # not required. VM name the template will be created from its volume or alternatively from a snapshot.,VM must be in stopped state if created from its volume.,Mutually exclusive with C(url).
sshkey_enabled: ${35:false} # not required. True if the template supports the sshkey upload feature.
state: ${36|present,absent,extracted|} # not required. choices: present;absent;extracted. State of the template.
is_routing: ${37:undefined} # not required. True if the template type is routing i.e., if template is used to deploy router.,Only considered if C(url) is used.

cs_user.description: Manages users on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_user:
username: ${1:undefined} # required. Username of the user.
keys_registered: ${2:null} # not required. If API keys of the user should be generated.,Note: Keys can not be removed by the API again.
timezone: ${3:null} # not required. Timezone of the user.

api_timeout: ${4:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${5:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_http_method: ${6|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${7:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url: ${8:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
password: ${9:null} # not required. Password of the user to be created.,Required on C(state=present).,Only considered on creation and will not be updated if user exists.
account: ${10:null} # not required. Account the user will be created under.,Required on C(state=present).
email: ${11:null} # not required. Email of the user.,Required on C(state=present).
domain: ${12:ROOT} # not required. Domain the user is related to.
first_name: ${13:null} # not required. First name of the user.,Required on C(state=present).
last_name: ${14:null} # not required. Last name of the user.,Required on C(state=present).

api_secret: ${15:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${16:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${17|present,absent,enabled,disabled,locked,unlocked|} # not required. choices: present;absent;enabled;disabled;locked;unlocked. State of the user.,C(unlocked) is an alias for C(enabled).

cs_vmsnapshot.description: Manages VM snapshots on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_vmsnapshot:
vm: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the virtual machine.
name: ${2:undefined} # required. Unique Name of the snapshot. In CloudStack terms display name.

api_timeout: ${3:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
description: ${4:undefined} # not required. Description of the snapshot.

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
tags: ${6:undefined} # not required. List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).,To delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).
domain: ${7:undefined} # not required. Domain the VM snapshot is related to.

api_url: ${8:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
poll_async: ${9:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
account: ${10:undefined} # not required. Account the VM snapshot is related to.
snapshot_memory: ${11:false} # not required. Snapshot memory if set to true.

api_secret: ${12:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
zone: ${13:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone in which the VM is in. If not set, default zone is used.
project: ${14:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the VM is assigned to.

api_key: ${15:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${16:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${17|present,absent,revert|} # not required. choices: present;absent;revert. State of the snapshot.

cs_volume.description: Manages volumes on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_volume:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the volume.,C(name) can only contain ASCII letters.

api_secret: ${2:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
shrink_ok: ${3:false} # not required. Whether to allow to shrink the volume.
tags: ${4:undefined} # not required. List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).,To delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).

api_url: ${5:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_timeout: ${6:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
project: ${7:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the volume to be deployed in.
min_iops: ${8:undefined} # not required. Min iops
custom_id: ${9:undefined} # not required. Custom id to the resource.,Allowed to Root Admins only.
zone: ${10:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone in which the volume should be deployed.,If not set, default zone is used.

api_key: ${11:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
vm: ${12:undefined} # not required. Name of the virtual machine to attach the volume to.
size: ${13:undefined} # not required. Size of disk in GB
force: ${14:false} # not required. Force removal of volume even it is attached to a VM.,Considered on C(state=absnet) only.

api_http_method: ${15|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${16:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
account: ${17:undefined} # not required. Account the volume is related to.
snapshot: ${18:undefined} # not required. The snapshot name for the disk volume.,Required one of C(disk_offering), C(snapshot) if volume is not already C(state=present).
domain: ${19:undefined} # not required. Name of the domain the volume to be deployed in.
max_iops: ${20:undefined} # not required. Max iops
api_region: ${21:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${22|present,absent,attached,detached|} # not required. choices: present;absent;attached;detached. State of the volume.
display_volume: ${23:true} # not required. Whether to display the volume to the end user or not.,Allowed to Root Admins only.
disk_offering: ${24:undefined} # not required. Name of the disk offering to be used.,Required one of C(disk_offering), C(snapshot) if volume is not already C(state=present).

cs_vpc.description: Manages VPCs on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_vpc:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the VPC.

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

api_key: ${3:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
clean_up: ${4:undefined} # not required. Whether to redeploy a VPC router or not when C(state=restarted)
tags: ${5:undefined} # not required. List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value).,For deleting all tags, set an empty list e.g. C(tags: []).

api_url: ${6:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
poll_async: ${7:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
network_domain: ${8:undefined} # not required. Network domain for the VPC.,All networks inside the VPC will belong to this domain.,Only considered while creating the VPC, can not be changed.
account: ${9:undefined} # not required. Account the VPC is related to.
domain: ${10:undefined} # not required. Domain the VPC is related to.

api_secret: ${11:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
zone: ${12:undefined} # not required. Name of the zone.,If not set, default zone is used.
project: ${13:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the VPC is related to.
api_region: ${14:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
cidr: ${15:undefined} # not required. CIDR of the VPC, e.g. 10.1.0.0/16,All VPC guest networks' CIDRs must be within this CIDR.,Required on C(state=present).
display_text: ${16:undefined} # not required. Display text of the VPC.,If not set, C(name) will be used for creating.
state: ${17|present,absent,restarted|} # not required. choices: present;absent;restarted. State of the VPC.
vpc_offering: ${18:undefined} # not required. Name of the VPC offering.,If not set, default VPC offering is used.

api_http_method: ${19|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

cs_vpc_offering.description: Manages vpc offerings on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_vpc_offering:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. The name of the vpc offering

api_key: ${2:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_timeout: ${3:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
service_offering: ${4:undefined} # not required. The name or ID of the service offering for the VPC router appliance.
service_capabilities: ${5:undefined} # not required. Desired service capabilities as part of vpc offering.

api_http_method: ${6|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${7:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url: ${8:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_secret: ${9:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
service_providers: ${10:undefined} # not required. provider to service mapping. If not specified, the provider for the service will be mapped to the default provider on the physical network
display_text: ${11:undefined} # not required. Display text of the vpc offerings
state: ${12|enabled,present,disabled,absent|} # not required. choices: enabled;present;disabled;absent. State of the vpc offering.
api_region: ${13:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
supported_services: ${14:undefined} # not required. Services supported by the vpc offering

cs_vpn_connection.description: Manages site-to-site VPN connections on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_vpn_connection:
vpc: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the VPC the VPN connection is related to.
vpn_customer_gateway: ${2:undefined} # required. Name of the VPN customer gateway.

api_timeout: ${3:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
force: ${4:false} # not required. Activate the VPN gateway if not already activated on C(state=present).,Also see M(cs_vpn_gateway).

api_http_method: ${5|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.
poll_async: ${6:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.
account: ${7:undefined} # not required. Account the VPN connection is related to.
passive: ${8:false} # not required. State of the VPN connection.,Only considered when C(state=present).
domain: ${9:undefined} # not required. Domain the VPN connection is related to.

api_secret: ${10:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
project: ${11:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the VPN connection is related to.

api_key: ${12:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
api_region: ${13:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${14|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the VPN connection.

api_url: ${15:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

cs_vpn_customer_gateway.description: Manages site-to-site VPN customer gateway configurations on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_vpn_customer_gateway:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the gateway.
ike_lifetime: ${2:undefined} # not required. Lifetime in seconds of phase 1 VPN connection.,Defaulted to 86400 by the API on creation if not set.

api_timeout: ${3:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.
force_encap: ${4|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Force encapsulation for NAT traversal.,Disabled per default by the API on creation if not set.
gateway: ${5:undefined} # not required. Public IP address of the gateway.,Required if C(state=present).
poll_async: ${6:true} # not required. Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url: ${7:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
dpd: ${8|true,false|} # not required. choices: true;false. Enable Dead Peer Detection.,Disabled per default by the API on creation if not set.
ipsec_psk: ${9:undefined} # not required. IPsec Preshared-Key.,Cannot contain newline or double quotes.,Required if C(state=present).
account: ${10:undefined} # not required. Account the VPN customer gateway is related to.
esp_policy: ${11:undefined} # not required. ESP policy in the format e.g. C(aes256-sha1;modp1536).,Required if C(state=present).
domain: ${12:undefined} # not required. Domain the VPN customer gateway is related to.
ike_policy: ${13:undefined} # not required. IKE policy in the format e.g. C(aes256-sha1;modp1536).,Required if C(state=present).

api_secret: ${14:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
project: ${15:undefined} # not required. Name of the project the VPN gateway is related to.

api_key: ${16:undefined} # not required. API key of the CloudStack API.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_KEY) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
cidrs: ${17:undefined} # not required. List of guest CIDRs behind the gateway.,Required if C(state=present).
state: ${18|present,absent|} # not required. choices: present;absent. State of the VPN customer gateway.
api_region: ${19:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
esp_lifetime: ${20:undefined} # not required. Lifetime in seconds of phase 2 VPN connection.,Defaulted to 3600 by the API on creation if not set.

api_http_method: ${21|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

cs_vpn_gateway.description: Manages site-to-site VPN gateways on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_vpn_gateway:

api_timeout: ${2:undefined} # not required. HTTP timeout in seconds.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is 10 seconds if not specified.

HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

api_secret: ${10:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

api_url: ${13:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

cs_zone.description: Manages zones on Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_zone:
name: ${1:undefined} # required. Name of the zone.
dns1_ipv6: ${2:null} # not required. First DNS for IPv6 for the zone.
dns2: ${3:null} # not required. Second DNS for the zone.

api_url: ${8:undefined} # not required. URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.

dns1: ${10:null} # not required. First DNS for the zone.,Required if C(state=present)
id: ${11:null} # not required. uuid of the existing zone.
dhcp_provider: ${12:null} # not required. DHCP provider for the Zone.

api_secret: ${14:undefined} # not required. Secret key of the CloudStack API.,If not set, the C(CLOUDSTACK_SECRET) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.
dns2_ipv6: ${15:null} # not required. Second DNS for IPv6 for the zone.
internal_dns1: ${16:null} # not required. First internal DNS for the zone.,If not set C(dns1) will be used on C(state=present).
api_region: ${17:cloudstack} # not required. Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_REGION) env variable is considered.
state: ${18|present,enabled,disabled,absent|} # not required. choices: present;enabled;disabled;absent. State of the zone.
guest_cidr_address: ${19:null} # not required. Guest CIDR address for the zone.

api_http_method: ${20|get,post|} # not required. choices: get;post. HTTP method used to query the API endpoint.,If not given, the C(CLOUDSTACK_METHOD) env variable is considered.,As the last option, the value is taken from the ini config file, also see the notes.,Fallback value is C(get) if not specified.

cs_zone_facts.description: Gathering facts of zones from Apache CloudStack based clouds.
body: cs_zone_facts:
